Bwile obu musaasa baaghilaghamu Lajaalo aalwala. Akaba aakaaye Bbetaniya, mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu Mali̱ya na Malita baabaagha baakaayemu.
Mali̱ya oghu niiye akaseesa bigita bisasi̱ye haa bighele bya Mukama aamulaghali̱ya biyo na esoke liye. Ti̱ Lajaalo oghu akaba alwaye akaba ali mwani̱nawe.
Banaani̱neemui babili aba baatumila Yesu makulu bati, “Mukama waatu, bhootu̱ syawe oghu oku̱ndi̱ye alwaye.”
Obu Yesu aaghu̱u̱ye makulu agha, aaghila ati, “Bulwaye obu tabuli bwa kumwita. Bhaatu bukuleka bantu bahe Luhanga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, kandi buleke bahe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa Mwana wa Luhanga.”
Yesu akaba akundiiye kimui Mali̱ya na waani̱na wee Malita kandi na Lajaalo oghu.
Bhaatu nankabha naaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Lajaalo oghu alwaye, Yesu aadu̱bha aamala bilo bibili hambali aabaagha.
Niibuwo aaghambiiye beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mwise tukuuke Bu̱yu̱daaya.”
Beeghesebuwa be aba baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, bwile butaseli̱ye Bayu̱daaya baa e Bu̱yu̱daaya baabbalagha kukuhuula mabaale, ti̱ olimabbala kutodha kukuukayo?”

Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye bwile bwa ntangaali̱ tabuli na saaha eku̱mi̱ na ebili? Muntu oghu akulubhatangagha bwile bukeeye taakukobhokagha bbaa, nanga akubaagha aboone haabwa kyeleeli̱ kya munsi muni.
Bhaatu oghu akulubhatangagha mukilo akukobhokagha nanga taali na kyeleeli̱.”
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aabaghila ati, “Bhootu̱ syatu Lajaalo aaghwesaghiiye, bhaatu nkughendayo ku̱mu̱su̱su̱mu̱la.”
Beeghesebuwa be aba baamukuukamu bati, “Mukama, Lajaalo akaakuba aghwesaghiiye akukila.”
Yesu ku̱bu̱gha atiyo aamani̱i̱si̱yagha ngoku Lajaalo aaku̱u̱ye, bhaatu ebo beeli̱li̱kana bati akwete kumani̱i̱si̱ya kughwesaghila mpongo sya bu̱li̱ kilo.
Niibuwo Yesu aabaghambiiye bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ati, “Lajaalo aaku̱u̱ye,
ti̱ ndheedheeu̱we haabwanu, nanga aaku̱u̱ye ntaliyo niikuwo mugubhe kweyongela ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye. Nahabweki muleke tughende hambali ali.”
Tomasi (oghu baaghilaghamu Mulongo) aaghila baanakiye ati, “Bhaawai̱ naatu mwise tughende, batwite hamui naye.”
Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetaniya, aasanga bamali̱ye bilo bbinaa baji̱i̱ki̱ye Lajaalo oghu.
Tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetaniya eghi akaba eli nga mailo ebili ku̱lu̱gha Yelusaalemu,
nahabweki Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye bakaba baalu̱ghi̱ye Yelusaalemu kwisa ku̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya Malita na Mali̱ya, haabwa ku̱kwi̱lu̱wa mwani̱nabo.
Obu Malita aaghu̱u̱ye ngu Yesu niibuwo aasa, aatuwa kughenda kumusangaana, bhaatu Mali̱ya eye aati̱ghala eka.
Obu Malita aaboone Yesu, aamughila ati, “Mukama, nguli waabaagha oliyo, mwani̱naasi̱ye tangu̱ku̱u̱ye.
Bhaatu nimani̱ye nankabha endindi, kyona eki okusaba Luhanga akukukolela kiyo.”
Yesu aakuukamu Malita ati, “Wanjoko waawe akutodha kuba mwomi̱i̱li̱.”
Malita aamukuukamu ati, “Nimani̱ye ali̱hu̱mbu̱ka haa kilo kya mpelo obu Luhanga ali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la bantu boona.”
Niibuwo Yesu aamughambiiye ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kandi bwomi̱i̱li̱. Oghu aku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, nankabha aku̱wa akutodha abe mwomi̱i̱li̱.
Kandi weena oghu akuukala anahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye, taali̱ku̱wa bbaa. Eki oki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je?”
Malita aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, Mukama, ni̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ngoku aaniiwe Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga, oghu akaasa munsi.”
Obu Malita aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aaghenda aabilikila waani̱nawee Mali̱ya haakpengbu̱, aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya aasi̱ye kandi akubbala kukubona.”
Obu Mali̱ya aaghu̱u̱ye atiyo, aamuka aaghenda kumusangaana.
Bwile obu Yesu akaba atakaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetaniya eghi, akaba anali hambali Malita aamusangaane.
Obu Bayu̱daaya abaabaagha bali mu numba na Mali̱ya baasi̱ye ku̱mu̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya baaboone naamatuka atiyo kutuwa, nabo baamulabha bamani̱ye bati aaghendi̱ye haa kituulo kulilila yo.
Obu Mali̱ya aaki̱dhi̱ye hambali Yesu ali naamubona, aamu̱teeli̱ya mu maghulu aamughila ati, “Mukama, nguli waabaagha oliyo, mwani̱naasi̱ye tangu̱ku̱u̱ye bbaa.”
Obu Yesu aaboone Mali̱ya naalila kandi na Bayu̱daaya aba Mali̱ya aasi̱ye nabo dhee mbalila, kisa kyamukwatila kimui.
Du̱mbi̱ aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Baamu̱ji̱i̱ki̱ye haa?”
Baani̱na Lajaalo aba baaghila bati, “Mukama, wiise tukwoleke.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aalila.
Obu Bayu̱daaya abaabaagha baliyo baaboone naalila, baaghila bati, “Mulole ngoku aali amu̱ku̱ndi̱ye kwonini.”
Bhaatu bamui mu bantu aba baaghila bati, “Musaasa oghu taaliiye oghu akaki̱li̱ya muntu maaso ghaaghaaye aamuughula gho? Buuye taagu̱bhi̱ye kujuna Lajaalo oghu kutaku̱wa?”
Yesu anakwatu̱u̱we kisa atiyo eesu̱kana haai na kituulo eki. Kikaba kili ki̱i̱na mu kibaale kiinamu̱li̱to bataaye ebaale liinamu̱li̱to haa mulyango ghwakiyo.
Yesu aabalaghila ati, “Muuyʼo ebaale eli.”
Bhaatu Malita mwani̱na Lajaalo oghu akaba aku̱u̱ye, aaghila Yesu ati, “Mukama endindi anu̱nki̱ye, nanga aakamala bilo bbinaa aku̱u̱ye.”
Yesu aamughila ati, “Tanaaku̱ghi̱li̱ye nti nuwaampi̱ki̱li̱i̱je, okubona ngoku Luhanga ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱?”
Niibuwo bantu aba baahi̱ye ebaale haa kituulo eki. Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aalola eghulu, aaghila ati, “Tita, nku̱ku̱si̱i̱ma nanga oku̱nji̱ghu̱wagha.
Nimani̱ye oku̱nji̱ghu̱wagha bwile bwona, bhaatu naabu̱ghi̱ye eki niikuwo bantu abaali hani bahi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.”
Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aabilikila nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Lajaalo tuwamu!”

Ti̱, Lajaalo oghu akaba aku̱u̱ye, aatuwa mu kituulo eki. Mikono yee na maghulu bikaba binabohi̱ye mu ngoye baabaagha bamu̱ji̱i̱ki̱yemu, kandi na katambaala kajelu baabaagha bamu̱bohi̱ye haali̱i̱so kanamuliyo.
Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mumusambuule, mumuleke aghende.”
Nahabweki Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye abaabaagha baasi̱ye kulola Mali̱ya, obu baaboone eki Yesu aakoli̱ye, baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
Bhaatu bamui mu Bayu̱daaya aba baaghenda baaghambila Bafali̱saayo eki Yesu aakoli̱ye.
Du̱mbi̱ bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na Bafali̱saayo baabilikila baamemba boona baa Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱, baaba na lukulato.
Baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Tukole ki? Musaasa oghu niibuwo aakola byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye.
Nitwanaleki̱ye eeyongela kubikola, bantu boona baku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, kandi Balooma abalemi̱ye etu̱we bakwisa bahwelekeeleli̱ye numba yaatu ya Luhanga hamui na ehanga lyatu.”
Niibuwo omui mu bo, li̱i̱na liye Kayaafa, oghu akaba ali mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona mwaka oghu, aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukwete ku̱bu̱gha nga bantu batali na eki mumani̱ye.
Tamumani̱ye ngu nkilungi muntu omui ku̱ku̱wa haabwa bantu baa ehanga lyatu, mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ehanga lyona kuhwelekeelela!”
Eki taaki̱bu̱ghi̱ye haabuwe eenini, bhaatu akabu̱gha nga mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona mwaka oghu. Aalanga majima ngoku Yesu abhonganuuwe ku̱kwi̱la bantu bʼomu ehanga lya Bayu̱daaya lyona.
Tabali bantu baa ehanga lya Bayu̱daaya bonkaha, bhaatu na bantu banji boona baa Luhanga abahanjikaane mu bi̱i̱kalo binji bikani̱ye, boona abakumaani̱li̱ye hamui.
Nahabweki ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la kilo eki beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baatandika kubbala mulingo balaatilamu Yesu.
Ekyalu̱ghi̱yemu, Yesu aaleka kubunga bbeni̱-bbeni̱ mu Bayu̱daaya. Bhaatu aalu̱ghayo hamui na beeghesebuwa be, baaghenda baakala mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghulabhaane na elungu oghu baaghilaghamu Efulahi̱mu̱.

Obu bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Bayu̱daaya kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo bwali buli haai ku̱hi̱ka, Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye baalu̱gha mu byalo, baaghenda e Yelusaalemu. Baaghenda kukola mi̱ghendi̱yo ya kweyeli̱ya ewaa Luhanga, ki̱ghenu̱ eki kitakahi̱ki̱ye.
Bantu aba baakala mbalola-kaka Yesu, kandi baakalagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Mu̱kweli̱li̱kana ki? Akwisa haa ki̱ghenu̱ hani?”
Baabu̱u̱lani̱ya batiyo nanga bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na Bafali̱saayo bakaba mbaalaghiiye bati oghu akubona hambali Yesu ali, aghende abaghambile niikuwo bamukwate.
Bikaba bi̱ti̱ghaaye bilo mukaagha Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo ku̱hi̱ka, Yesu aaki̱dha e Bbetaniya hambali Lajaalo oghu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye aabaagha aakaaye.
Baatekani̱li̱ja Yesu kiihulo mu ka ya Lajaalo oghu, Malita aatandika kubaheeleli̱ya haa kiihulo eki. Lajaalo naye akaba ali mu bantu abaaliilagha haa meeja emui na Yesu.

Niibuwo Mali̱ya aasi̱ye akwete cu̱pa esemeeye, elimu bigita bisasi̱ye kandi bi̱tembi̱ye kwonini, aabiseesela Yesu mu bighele kandi aatandika kumulaghali̱ya bighele ebi naakoleesi̱ya esoke liye. Ti̱ kusasa kwa bigita ebi kwamalakaka numba eghi yoona.
Bhaatu omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu, Yu̱da Esikalyota, oghu aaghendagha ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, aaghila ati,
“Ekyaleki̱ye bigita ebi bataabi̱ghu̱li̱ya kandi sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu basiha banaku nkiki? Byangu̱lu̱ghi̱yemu sente syengaane na musaala ghwa muntu ghwa mwaka ghwona.”
Taabu̱ghi̱ye eki nanga ngu afu̱u̱yʼo banaku, bhaatu nanga akaba ali musuma. Niiye akaba ali mu̱bi̱i̱ki̱ wa nsau yabo ya sente kandi bunji na bunji aabhaghamu sente.
Yesu aaghila ati, “Mumuleke! Aakoli̱ye eki kuteekani̱ja kujiikuwa kwanje.
Banaku mukuukala nabo bwile bwona, bhaatu si̱ye tankuukala naanu bwile bwona bbaa.”
Ki̱bbu̱la kyamaani̱ kya Bayu̱daaya baaghu̱wa bantu mbabu̱gha ngoku Yesu ali e Bbetaniya. Du̱mbi̱ baaghendayo, kutali kulola Yesu enkaha bhaatu kulola na Lajaalo oghu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye.
Nahabweki bakulu baa bahongi̱ baatʼo ntegheka ya kwita Lajaalo oghu dhee,
nanga haabwa Lajaalo oghu, Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye baabalu̱ghʼo kandi baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu.
Kilo ekyalabhi̱i̱yʼo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaali baasi̱ye haabwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, baaghu̱wa ngu Yesu niibuwo aasa e Yelusaalemu.
Nahabweki baajomba bi̱kongu̱bho kandi baaghenda kumusangaana, mbanagola bati,
“Ooyee!
Ali na mu̱gi̱sa oni oghu aasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama!
Ali na mu̱gi̱sa Mukama wa I̱saaleeli̱.”
Kandi Yesu aabona kyana kya ndogooi̱, aani̱i̱na aakisitamʼo, ngoku kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu,
“Mutoobaha enu̱we bantu baa Sayu̱u̱ni̱,
mulole mukama waanu niibuwo aasa,
asitami̱ye haa kyana kya ndogooi̱.”

Haaku̱du̱bha beeghesebuwa baa Yesu tabeetegheleei̱ye bintu ebi. Bhaatu haanu̱ma ya Yesu kukuuka mu eghulu, niibuwo baasu̱ki̱ye ngoku bintu ebi byahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱wʼo Yesu, kandi ngoku ebyalehukanagha ebi byasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya bintu ebi.
Ti̱ ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaagha na Yesu obu aabilikiiye Lajaalo mu kituulo kandi aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la mu baku̱u̱ye, beeyongela kulalangi̱ya makulu agha.
Kighendeleluwa ekyaleki̱ye ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki baaghenda hambali Yesu ali, ni nanga bakaaghu̱wa kyakuswekani̱ya eki aakoli̱ye.
Nahabweki Bafali̱saayo baatandika kughambilana bati, “Ni majima ngu tatuli na eki tukwete kukola kulengʼo kutanga musaasa oghu! Olole ngoku bantu boona bakwete kumukwamilila!”
Mu bantu abaaghendi̱ye Yelusaalemu kulami̱ya Luhanga mu bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo hakaba halimu bamui mu Bagi̱li̱ki̱.
Niibuwo baasi̱ye hambali Fi̱li̱po ali oghu akaba alu̱ghi̱ye e Bbetesai̱da mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Baamughila bati, “Wai̱tu̱, tukubbala kusanga-sangaana na Yesu.”
Fi̱li̱po aaghenda aaghambila Andeleya, du̱mbi̱ bombi Andeleya na Fi̱li̱po baaghenda baaghambila Yesu.
Yesu aaghila ati, “Bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Luhanga kuha Mwana wa Muntu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, bataaheli̱ye kasigho kaa ndimo mu etaka, kaku̱wa kakuukalagha kali kasigho kamui konkaha. Bhaatu bakaakukahelagha nkaaku̱wa, niibuwo kaku̱lu̱ghaghamu busigho bukani̱ye.
Muntu weena oghu akukunda bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe akubufeeluwa, bhaatu oghu akubwoha munsi muni, akuba na bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
Kandi weena oghu aku̱heeleli̱ya si̱ye, akulaghiluwa kunkwamilila, ti̱ hambali nkuba ndi, niiyo naye akuukala dhee. Ti̱ muntu weena naaheeleei̱ye si̱ye, Tita aku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya.”
Yesu eeyongela kughila ati, “Ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye ntuntuuye, buuye mbu̱ghe nti, ‘Tita, onjune kubona-bona kuni’? Bbaa, nanga eki niikiyo kighendeleluwa ekyaleki̱ye naasa munsi.
Tita, wooleke bantu ngoku oli na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa!”
Aakabu̱ghi̱ye atiyo, elaka lyalu̱gha mu eghulu, lyaghila liti, “Nooleki̱ye bantu ngoku ndi na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, kandi nkutodha kubooleka kiyo!”
Obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo baaghu̱u̱ye elaka eli bateetegheeleli̱ya bighambo ebi. Bamui mu bo baaghila bati ni nkubha. Bhaatu banji baaghila bati ni malai̱ka akwete ku̱bu̱gha na Yesu.
Yesu aaghila bantu aba ati, “Elaka eli ndyakughasila enu̱we, talili lyakughasila si̱ye bbaa.
Bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Luhanga ku̱twi̱la nsi eni musango. Kandi bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Si̱taani̱ oghu alemi̱ye nsi eni Luhanga kumubhingamu.
Bhaatu si̱ye bakaakumbamba haa musalaba, nkuleka bantu boona baase ewanje.”
Akabu̱gha eki kwoleka mulingo aaghendagha ku̱kwi̱lamu.

Niibuwo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba baamu̱ghi̱li̱ye bati, “Tukusomagha mu bilaghilo hambali bi̱ghi̱li̱ye ngu, Ki̱li̱si̱to akuukalʼo bilo nʼebilo, ti̱ uwe okugubha oti̱ya kughila ngu, ‘Mwana wa Muntu bakumubamba haa musalaba’? Ni Mwana wa Muntu wa mulingo ki okwete kughamba?”
Yesu aabaghila ati, “Kyeleeli̱ kibalimu haabwa bwile bukee. Mubunge munali na kyeleeli̱, mweli̱ma ghutakabahi̱ki̱yʼo. Oghu akubungilagha mu mweli̱ma taakumanyagha hambali akwete kughenda.
Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je kyeleeli̱ munali nakiyo, niikuwo mugubhe kufooka baana baa kyeleeli̱ eki.” Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aabalu̱ghʼo kandi muntu nʼomui ataamanya hambali aaghendi̱ye.
Nankabha Yesu naakoli̱ye byakuswekani̱ya ebi byona banabiboone, baabhenga dhee ku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
Eki kikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱ye kuba majima ngu:
“Mukama, ni ani̱ ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je butumuwa bwatu,
kandi ni ani̱ aaboone bu̱toki̱ bwa Mukama?”
Bhaatu tabaagu̱bhi̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku aaghi̱li̱ye ati,
“Aaghaaye maaso ghaabo
kandi oomakakani̱ya mitima yabo,
niikuwo batagubha kubona na maaso ghaabo,
kandi kwetegheeleli̱ya mu mitima yabo,
kandi bankuukʼo, mbaki̱li̱ye.”
I̱saaya akabu̱gha eki nanga akabona ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Yesu kandi aabu̱gha ebikwetʼo Yesu.

Ti̱ bwile obu bakani̱ye mu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, bhaatu haabwa kwobaha Bafali̱saayo, boobaha kukyatula mu bantu ngoku baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je. Boobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bafali̱saayo kubabhinga mu elami̱li̱yo.
Beebembeli̱ aba baabbalagha bantu babasinde mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Luhanga kubasinda.
Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye na elaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Weena oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye taani̱i̱si̱ye ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je nenkaha bbaa, ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je na oghu akantuma.
Ti̱ na oghu aaboone si̱ye, aboone dhee na oghu akantuma.
Naasi̱ye munsi nga kyeleeli̱, niikuwo weena oghu aku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye, ataakala anali mu mweli̱ma.
“Muntu weena naanaaghu̱u̱ye butumuwa bwanje kandi abhenga ku̱bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, taani̱i̱si̱ye nku̱mu̱twi̱la musango bbaa, nanga tanaasi̱ye ku̱twi̱la bantu baa munsi musango, nkaasa kubajuna.

Abakubhengagha si̱ye kandi babhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja butumuwa bwanje, bali na oghu akwisa kubatwi̱la musango. Ti̱ bighambo nkwete kubaghambila bini, niibiyo bilileka haa kilo kya mpelo Luhanga abatwi̱le musango.
Agha ni majima ghoonini, nanga tankwete ku̱bu̱gha haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwanje neenini, bhaatu Tita oghu akantuma niiye andaghiiye ebi mbhonganuuwe ku̱bu̱gha.
Kandi nimani̱ye ngoku ebi akulaghilagha bikuhaagha bantu bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo. Nahabweki ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha ni ebi Tita oghu angambiiye ku̱bu̱gha.”

Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kikaba kili haai ku̱hi̱ka. Yesu aamanya ngoku bwile buwe bwa ku̱lu̱gha munsi muni kukuuka ewaa Ese wee bwahi̱ki̱ye. Yesu akaba aku̱ndi̱ye beeghesebuwa be abali munsi, kandi ooleka ngoku abakundiiye kwonini ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kumaliilila.
Baaliyagha kyalwagholo, kandi Si̱taani̱ akaba naamali̱ye kuta kyeli̱li̱kano kya ku̱ghobeli̱ya Yesu mu mutima ghwa Yu̱da Esikalyota, mutabani̱ wa Si̱mooni̱.
Yesu akaba amani̱ye ngoku Esewee aamuhaaye bu̱toki̱ haa bu̱li̱ kintu kyona, kandi ngoku aalu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga kandi ngoku akukuuka ewaa Luhanga.
Nahabweki banali haa kiihulo haala Yesu aamuka, eehiyamu kooti̱ eghi aabaagha alu̱wete, kandi eeboha taulo mu mi̱ghelu̱.
Haanu̱ma ya eki, aata maasi mu bbaafu kandi aatandika kunaabi̱ya beeghesebuwa be mu maghulu, naanaghalaghali̱ya ku̱ghoomi̱ya na taulo eghi aabaagha eebohi̱ye mu mi̱ghelu̱.
Niibuwo aahi̱ki̱ye hambali Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo ali, Peetelo oghu aamughila ati, “Mukama, taki̱hi̱ki̱ye uwe kunaabi̱ya si̱ye mu maghulu bbaa.”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Endindi taweetegheleei̱ye eki nkwete kukola, bhaatu oku̱kyetegheeleli̱ya haanu̱ma.”
Peetelo aaghila ati, “Tookunaabi̱ya si̱ye mu maghulu bbaa.”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ntaakunaabi̱i̱ye mu maghulu, okuba otali mweghesebuwa wanje.”
Niibuwo Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo oghu aamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu ati, “Mukama, otaanaabi̱ya mu maghulu honkaha, bhaatu onaabi̱ye mu mikono kandi na mu mutuwe dhee!”

Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Muntu oghu amali̱ye kunaaba taakwetaaghisibuwagha kutodha kunaaba, kuuyʼo akunaabagha mu maghulu honkaha, nanga mubili ghuwe ghwona ghweli̱ye. Enu̱we beeghesebuwa banje mweli̱ye, nankabha etali enu̱we boona.”
Nanga akaba amani̱ye oghu aku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye aaghila ati tabali beeghesebuwa be boona abeeli̱ye.

Obu aamali̱ye kunaabi̱ya beeghesebuwa be mu maghulu, aatodha aalu̱waala eki aabaagha eetu̱bu̱u̱yemu, aaghenda aasitama mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye. Aabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mwetegheleei̱ye eki nku̱lu̱gha kubakolela?”
Aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we mukungilaghamu muti, ‘Mwegheesi̱ya’ kandi ‘Mukama,’ mu̱hi̱ki̱i̱ye kungila mutiyo, nanga ni̱i̱si̱ye mwegheesi̱ya kandi Mukama waanu.
Nahabweki si̱ye Mukama kandi mwegheesi̱ya waanu, naabanaabi̱i̱ye mu maghulu, naanu dhee mubhonganuuwe kunaabangani̱ya mu maghulu.
Naabooleki̱ye kyakulolelʼo ngu naanu mubhonganuuwe kukola nga eki naabakoleeye.
Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, mu̱heeleli̱ya taasaai̱ye mukama wee, kandi mutumuwa taasaai̱ye oghu amu̱tu̱mi̱ye.
Ti̱ enu̱we bintu bini mubimani̱ye, nimwabikoli̱ye Luhanga akubaha mu̱gi̱sa.

“Tankwete kughila nti Luhanga akuha mu̱gi̱sa enu̱we boona. Nkakoma enu̱we nimani̱ye ngoku bu̱li̱ muntu ali. Bhaatu mu enu̱we halimu oghu naakomi̱ye nimani̱ye ngoku aku̱ngobeli̱ya, eki kikaba ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ekyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ekikughilagha kiti, ‘Oghu ali nga bhootu̱ syanje haabwanje kuliya hamui naye niiye aabaaye ngi̱ghu̱ yanje.’
“Naabaghambiiye ngoku omui mu enu̱we aku̱ngobeli̱ya kitakabaayʼo, niikuwo nkyabaayʼo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je ngu Ni̱i̱syoni Ki̱li̱si̱to.
Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, weena oghu akubhasila oghu ntu̱mi̱ye, ni̱i̱si̱ye akuba abhasiiye, kandi oghu akubhasila si̱ye, akuba abhasiiye oghu akantuma.”
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱bu̱gha ebi, Yesu aaghu̱wa ali na bujune mu mutima kandi aaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, omui mu enu̱we aku̱ngobeli̱ya.”
Beeghesebuwa be aba baatandika kulolana omui-omui, bhaatu bataagubha kutunga mulingo ghwa kumanya oghu akwete kughamba.
Omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu oghu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye akaba asitami̱ye haai naye hambali baaliilagha.
Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aakolela sai̱ni̱ mweghesebuwa onji oghu akaba asitami̱ye haai na Yesu ati amu̱bu̱u̱li̱ye oghu akwete kughamba.
Mweghesebuwa oghu eegi̱ma Yesu, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama ni ani̱ okwete kughamba?”

Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ni oghu nkuha ki̱twi̱ke kya mugaati̱ ghuni haanu̱ma ya ku̱ghu̱koli̱ya mu bbaaku̱li̱.” Niibuwo aakoleei̱ye ki̱twi̱ke kya mugaati̱ oghu mu bbaaku̱li̱, aakiha Yu̱da Esikalyota mutabani̱ wa Si̱mooni̱.
Yu̱da oghu makaliya ati ki̱twi̱ke kya mugaati̱ oghu, Si̱taani̱ aataaha mu mutima ghuwe.
Yesu aamughila ati, “Eki olimaghenda kukola, okikole bwangu.”
Bhaatu taabaayʼo nʼomui haa kiihulo haala oghu akakenga ekyaleki̱ye Yesu aaghila atiyo Yu̱da oghu.

Ngoku Yu̱da aaniiye akaba ali na bujunaani̱ji̱buwa bwa kubiika sente, bamui mu beeghesebuwa aba beeli̱li̱kana bati Yesu niibuwo aamughambila kughula ebi bakwetaaghisibuwa haabwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Beeli̱li̱kana bati kedha niibuwo aamughambila kughula bya kuha banaku.
Yu̱da oghu makamala ati kuliya mugaati̱ oghu, du̱mbi̱ aatuwa aaghenda. Bwile bukaba mbwali̱ye.
Haanu̱ma ya Yu̱da oghu kughenda, Yesu aaghila ati, “Bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Luhanga kwoleka ngoku Mwana wa Muntu ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, kandi haabuwe bantu bakumanya ngoku Luhanga ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.”
Kaakuba bantu bamanya ngoku Luhanga ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa haabwa Mwana wee, Luhanga akwoleka dhee bantu ngoku Mwana wee ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Kandi eki akukikola bwangu.
“Enu̱we baana banje, nkuukala naanu bwile bukee. Mukumbala, kandi ngoku naaghambiiye Bayu̱daaya, niikuwo ndimaghambila naanu endindi nti hambali nkughenda, tamukugubha kughendayo bbaa.
“Ndimabaha kilaghilo kihyaka: Mukundangane ngoku nanje naaku̱ndi̱ye enu̱we. Nahabweki mubhonganuuwe kukundangana.
Nimwakundangaane, bantu boona bakumanya ngoku muli beeghesebuwa banje.”
Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama, okughenda haa?”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Hambali nkughenda endindi tamukugubha kughenda yo, bhaatu mukunkwama haanu̱ma.”
Peetelo oghu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama wanje, ekyanguleka ntakukwama endindi nkiki? Si̱ye neeteekani̱i̱je ku̱ku̱wa haabwawe.”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Weeteekani̱i̱je ku̱ku̱wa haabwanje? Nkughambiiye majima ghoonini, nkoko etakakooki̱ye okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu.”
Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mitima yaanu eleke kutuntula. Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je Luhanga kandi mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je nanje dhee.
Mu numba ya Tita halimu bisiika bikani̱ye. Nguli ghataabaagha majima, tanaangubaghambiiye nti ndimaghendayo kubateekani̱li̱ya bi̱i̱kalo.
Ti̱ nkaakughenda kandi ninaamala kubateekani̱li̱ja bi̱i̱kalo, nkukuuka mbatwale niikuwo hambali nkuba ndi haaliiyo naanu mwakala dhee nanje.
Enu̱we mumani̱ye kihanda kya kughenda mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali nkughenda.”
Tomasi aamughila ati, “Mukama wanje, tatumani̱ye hambali okwete kughenda, buuye kihanda tulakimanya tu̱ti̱ya?”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni kihanda kandi majima kandi bwomi̱i̱li̱. Taaliyo oghu akugubha kughenda ewaa Tita atakwamiiye muli si̱ye.
Nimwabaaye mumani̱ye si̱ye kwonini na Tita mukumumanya dhee. Ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha endindi na kweyongelayo mumumani̱ye kandi mwamuboone.”
Fi̱li̱po aaghila ati, “Mukama, otwoleke Sowaawe, eki kikuba kitumali̱ye.”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Fi̱li̱po, toomani̱ye si̱ye haanu̱ma ya kuukala naanu bwile bukani̱ye obu bwona? Muntu weena oghu aaboone si̱ye, aaboone Tita. Okugubha oti̱ya kughila oti, ‘Otwoleke Sowaawe’?
Tamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ngoku ndi muli Tita kandi na Tita aaba muli si̱ye? Bighambo ebi nkubaghambilagha tabili byanje nenkaha. Bhaatu Tita oghu ali muli si̱ye, niiye akwete kukola mulimo ghuwe.
Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je si̱ye ninaabaghi̱li̱ye nti ndi muli Tita kandi na Tita ali muli si̱ye, hakili mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je si̱ye haabwa byakuswekani̱ya ebi mukubonagha ninkola.
Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, nimwahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye, mukukola nga ebi naakolagha. Haanu̱ma yanje kughenda ewaa Tita, mukugubha kukola byakuswekani̱ya ebisaai̱ye ebi si̱ye nkwete kukola.
Kyona eki mukusaba mu li̱i̱na lyanje, nkubakolela kiyo, niikuwo bantu bagubhe kuha Tita ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kukwama mu si̱ye Mwana wee.
Kaakuba musaba kintu kyona mu li̱i̱na lyanje, nkubakolela kiyo.
“Kaakuba mukunda si̱ye mukukola ebi nkubalaghilagha kukola.
Kandi nkusaba Tita Luhanga kubaha Mu̱kooneli̱ onji kuukala naanu bilo nʼebilo.

Mu̱kooneli̱ oghu ni Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akubooleka majima haa Luhanga. Bhaatu bantu baa nsi tabakugubha kumutangilila kandi kumumanya ngoku ali. Bhaatu enu̱we mumumani̱ye nanga akuukalagha naanu kandi haanu̱ma aliba mu enu̱we.
Tankubati̱gha nga nku̱u̱bbi̱ bbaa, nkutodha kukuuka hambali muli.
Bwile butaseli̱ya bantu baa munsi tabakutodha kumbona, bhaatu enu̱we mukumbona. Nanga si̱ye ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱, naanu mukuba boomi̱i̱li̱.
Bwile obu mukumanya ngoku si̱ye hamui na Tita tuli mu bumui kwonini, kandi naanu muli mu bumui kwonini hamui nanje kandi nanje ndi bumui kwonini naanu.
Weena oghu akukwata bilaghilo byanje, oghu niiye anku̱ndi̱ye. Kandi oghu anku̱ndi̱ye oghu na Tita akumukunda dhee, kandi nanje ni̱mu̱ku̱ndi̱ye dhee kandi nkumweyoleka ngoku ndi.”
Niibuwo Yu̱da (atali Yu̱da Esikalyota) aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukama, ekikulekagha obbala kutweyoleka kandi otabbala kweyoleka bantu baa munsi ngoku oli nkiki?”
Yesu aakuukamu ati, “Muntu naabaaye anku̱ndi̱ye, akukwata ebi nkwegheesi̱yagha. Tita akumukunda, kandi tumwisile tuukale hamui naye.
Muntu weena oghu ataku̱ndi̱ye si̱ye, taakukwata ebi nkwegheesi̱yagha. Bighambo ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye nimbaghambila ebi, tabili byanje nenkaha bbaa, ni bya Tita oghu akantuma.
“Bini byona naabi̱bu̱ghi̱ye ninali naanu.

Bhaatu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akwisa kuba Mu̱kooneli̱ waanu. Niiye Tita akutuma kwisa mu li̱i̱na lyanje. Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu aku̱beegheesi̱ya bintu byona kandi abaasu̱ki̱ye bintu byona ebi naabaghambiiye ninali naanu.
Ndimabaha mpempa yonkaha, kandi mpempa eghi ni̱i̱si̱ye nenkaha nkugubha kughiha enu̱we. Teeli nga eghi bantu baa nsi bakuhaagha. Nahabweki muleke kutuntula kandi kwobaha.
“Mwaghu̱u̱ye ningila nti, ‘Nkughenda ewaa Tita kandi nkukuuka hambali muli.’ Nimwabaaye mu̱nku̱ndi̱ye, kughenda ewaa Tita kukubadheedha, nanga Tita ansaai̱ye bu̱toki̱.
Naabaghambiiye eki kitakabaayʼo, niikuwo nkyabaayʼo mweyongele ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye.
Tankutodha ku̱bu̱gha naanu bintu bikani̱ye, nanga Si̱taani̱ oghu alemi̱ye nsi eni alimaasa kulwani̱i̱si̱ya si̱ye. Bhaatu taali na bu̱toki̱ haa si̱ye bbaa.
Bhaatu nkwete kukola ebi Tita andaghiiye kukola niikuwo bantu baa munsi bamanye ngoku nku̱ndi̱ye Tita.
“Nahabweki, muleke tu̱lu̱ghe hani tughende.”
Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye ki̱ti̱na kyamajima kya mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, Tita niiye mu̱li̱mi̱ wa musili oghu.
Akujombagha etai lyona elili mu si̱ye elitaakwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma. Bhaatu elikwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma akulisaliililagha, niikuwo lyeyongele kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye.
Enu̱we mwamali̱ye kufooka abeeli̱ye ewaa Luhanga haabwa bighambo naabaghambiiye.

Muukale mu si̱ye kandi nanje nkuukala mu enu̱we. Taaliyo etai elikugubha kwana bi̱ghu̱ma haabwa liyo lyonkaha, likulaghiluwa kuba lili haa ki̱ti̱na. Naanu dhee tamukugubha kwana bi̱ghu̱ma kuuyʼo muukaaye muli si̱ye.”
“Ni̱i̱si̱ye ki̱ti̱na; enu̱we mwaba matai. Muntu naakaaye muli si̱ye kandi nanje niikala muli eye, akwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye. Nimwakaaye mutali mu bumui nanje, tamukugubha kukola kintu kyona bbaa.
Muntu weena ataakaaye muli si̱ye, ali nga etai eli bakukubagha kandi lyoma, matai nga agha bakughakomagha, baghakuba mu mulilo kandi baghoki̱ya.
Kaakuba muukala muli si̱ye kandi na bighambo byanje biikala mu enu̱we, musabe kyona eki mukubbala kandi kikubakoleluwa.
Ekikuleka bantu mbaha Tita ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, ni enu̱we kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye, niikuwo mweyoleke ngoku muli beeghesebuwa banje.
“Ngoku Tita anku̱ndi̱ye, niikuwo nanje mbaku̱ndi̱ye. Nahabweki mutalu̱gha mu kukunda kwanje.
Nimwakaaye nimunakola ebi naabalaghiiye, kikwoleka ngu munali mu kukunda kwanje, ngoku si̱ye naakaaye niinakola ebi Tita andaghiiye kandi naakala mu kukunda kuwe.
Naabaghambiiye ebi niikuwo kudheedhuwa kwanje kuukale mu enu̱we, kandi kudheedhuwa oku kuusulile kimui.
Eki ndimalaghila ni ngu: Mukundangane ngoku nanje naabaku̱ndi̱ye.
Kukunda kwamaani̱ oku muntu akugubha kuba nakuwo haa baabhootu̱ si̱ye, ni kuhaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe ku̱ku̱wa haabwabo.
Nimwakaaye nimunakola ebi naabalaghiiye, mukuba nimwoleka ngoku muli baabhootu̱ syanje.
Tankyabaghilamu baheeleli̱ya, nanga mu̱heeleli̱ya taakumanya ebi mukama wee akutegheka. Bhaatu naabaghi̱li̱yemu baabhootu̱ syanje nanga naabaghambiiye byona ebi Tita angambiiye.

Taali̱i̱nu̱we mwekomi̱ye kuba beeghesebuwa banje. Bhaatu ni̱i̱si̱ye nkabakoma kandi naabaha mulimo ghwa kughenda kandi kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye kandi bi̱ghu̱ma ebikuukalʼo bilo nʼebilo. Ti̱ kyona eki mulasabagha Tita mu li̱i̱na lyanje alabahaagha kiyo.
Ndimatodha kubalaghila nti: Mukundangane.”
“Bantu baa nsi mboohi̱ye enu̱we, muukale mukimani̱ye ngoku baadu̱bhi̱ye kwoha si̱ye.

Nimwanabaaye mu bumui na bantu baa nsi, bangu̱ku̱ndi̱ye enu̱we ngoku baku̱ndi̱ye baabhootu̱ syabo. Enu̱we tamuli baabo; bhaatu nkakoma enu̱we naabaaye mu bantu aba, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye bantu baa nsi aba boohi̱ye enu̱we.
Muusuke ebi naabaghambiiye nti, ‘Mu̱heeleli̱ya taasaai̱ye mukama wee.’
Bakubatwalikani̱ya batiyo nanga enu̱we kuba banje, kandi nanga tabamani̱ye oghu akantuma.
Nguli ntaasi̱ye mbaghambila butumuwa bwa Luhanga, tabangubaaye na musango ghwa bibhi byabo. Bhaatu endindi tabali na kyakwekwati̱i̱si̱ya haabwa bibhi byabo.
Oghu anjoi̱ye, oohi̱ye dhee na Tita.

Nguli ntaakoli̱ye mu ebo byakuswekani̱ya ebi muntu onji atakakolagha, tabangu̱si̱ngu̱u̱we musango ghwa bibhi byabo. Bhaatu endindi baboone byakuswekani̱ya ebi, ti̱ boohi̱ye etu̱we bombi, si̱ye kandi Tita.
Bhaatu eki kikaba ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu bilaghilo byabo ngu, ‘Bakanjoha batali na kighendeleluwa.’

“Bhaatu nkutumila enu̱we Mu̱kooneli̱ ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Tita, Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akubooleka majima haa Luhanga. Akubaasamu ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Tita kandi akuha buukai̱so naabu̱gha byona ebikwetʼo si̱ye.
Naanu dhee mubhonganuuwe kuha buukai̱so haa bikwetʼo si̱ye, nanga mwakaaye nanje ku̱lu̱gha hambali naatandikiiye mulimo ghuni.”
Yesu eeyongela kughila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Naabaghambiiye niikuwo bantu mbaatandi̱ki̱ye kubona-boni̱ya enu̱we haabwanje, mutalu̱gha haa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu.
Nanga bantu bakutanga enu̱we kughenda kulami̱li̱ya mu malami̱li̱yo ghaabo. Majima bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka obu muntu akweli̱li̱kana ati naati̱ye enu̱we akuba naaheeleli̱ya Luhanga.
Bakukola bintu ebi byona nanga tabakamani̱ye Tita kedha si̱ye.

Naabaghambiiye ebi niikuwo bwile mbwahi̱ki̱ye bwa kubona-boni̱ya enu̱we, muukale mumani̱ye ngoku naasangu̱u̱we mbaghambiiye. Tanaabaghambiiye bini obu naatandikagha mulimo ghuni, nanga nkaba ndi hamui naanu.
“Endindi ndi haai kughenda ewaa oghu akantuma. Bhaatu taaliyo nʼomui mu enu̱we oghu ambu̱u̱i̱ye ati, ‘Okughenda haa?’
Bhaatu haabwa kubaghambila bintu ebi kyaleki̱ye mwatuntula mu mitima yaanu.
Nkubbala kubaghambila majima, kughenda kwanje kukughasila enu̱we. Ntaaghendi̱ye, Mu̱kooneli̱ taakwisa mu enu̱we bbaa. Ninaaghendi̱ye, nkumutuma aase mu enu̱we.
Akaakwisa niiye akwoleka bantu baa nsi majima ngoku bali na kibhi, kandi ngoku Luhanga ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kandi ngoku akubatwi̱la musango haabwa bibhi byabo.
Akubooleka ngoku bali na kibhi haabwa kutampi̱ki̱li̱ja.
Akwoleka bantu baa nsi eni oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini mu maaso ghaa Luhanga, nanga si̱ye ndimakuuka ewaa Tita, kandi tamukutodha kumbona.
Niiye dhee akuleka bantu mbamanya ngoku baku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango, nanga Luhanga aamali̱ye ku̱tu̱wamu kufubila Si̱taani̱ oghu alemi̱ye nsi eni.
“Ndi na bikani̱ye bya kubaghambila, bhaatu tamukubigubha byona bbaa.

Bhaatu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akaakwisa, akubooleka majima haa Luhanga, aku̱beegheesi̱ya majima ghoona ghaa Luhanga. Taaku̱bu̱gha haabwa bu̱toki̱ buwe enkaha bbaa. Akubaghambila ebi aaghu̱u̱ye Tita naabu̱gha. Akutodha abaghambile ebikubʼo mu bwile obukwisa mu maaso.
Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akumpa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa nanga akukwata ebi nku̱bu̱gha byonini kandi abighambile enu̱we.
Byona ebi Tita ali nabiyo ni byanje, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabaghila Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akukwata ebi nkumughambila kandi niibiyo byonini akughambila enu̱we.
“Bwile butaseli̱ye tamukutodha kumbona kandi haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee mukutodha kumbona.”

Niibuwo bamui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu aba baatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye ki kughila ati, ‘Bwile butaseli̱ye tamukutodha kumbona, kandi haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee mukutodha kumbona,’ kandi kughila ati, ‘Nanga ndimaghenda ewaa Tita’?”
Baakala mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye ki kughila ati, ‘bwile bukee’? Ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha tatu̱byetegheleei̱ye bbaa.”

Yesu aamanya ngoku bakubbala ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya haa eki aabu̱ghi̱ye eki, niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukwete ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya haa eki naamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye obu naaghi̱li̱ye nti, ‘Bwile butaseli̱ye tamukutodha kumbona kandi haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee mukutodha kumbona’?
Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, enu̱we mukusaaliluwa kandi mutuntule bhaatu bantu baa nsi ebo bakuba badheedheeu̱we. Mukutuntula bhaatu kutuntula kwanu ku̱ku̱lu̱ghamu kudheedhuwa.

Kili ngoku mukali̱ oghu bwile buwe bwa ku̱byala bwahi̱ki̱ye akusaaliluwagha. Bhaatu akaaku̱byalagha mwana wee, mukali̱ oghu aabululuwa busaali̱ji̱ obu, nanga aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha adheedheeu̱we munu haabwa mwana aabyaye oghu.
Niikuwo kili kitiyo naanu dhee, endindi ni bwile bwanu bwa kusaaliluwa, bhaatu nkaakutodha ninaababona mukudheedhuwa, kandi kudheedhuwa oku taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akubaayʼo kuwo bbaa.
Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, bwile obu tamulitodha ku̱mbu̱u̱li̱ya kantu koona. Tita akubaha kyona eki mukusaba mu li̱i̱na lyanje.
Ku̱hi̱ki̱ya na endindi tamukasabi̱ye kintu kyona mu li̱i̱na lyanje. Musabe, mukutunga eki mwasabi̱ye, kandi mukudheedhuwa kwonini.
“Nankabha ninaabu̱ghagha naanu haa bintu ebi ni̱nkoleesi̱ya nsi̱mo, bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka obu ntaakutodha ku̱koleesi̱ya nsi̱mo esi. Bhaatu nkubaghambila bbeni̱-bbeni̱ haa ebikwetʼo Tita.
Ti̱ bwile obu mukusaba ebi mukwetaaghisibuwa mu li̱i̱na lyanje, kandi tankwetaaghisibuwa kusaba Tita kubakolela ebi mwasabi̱ye ebi bbaa.
Tita oghu eenini aku̱ndi̱ye enu̱we nanga enu̱we kukunda si̱ye kandi ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku naalu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga.
Nkaasa mu nsi muni ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Tita, endindi ndimalu̱gha munsi kandi kukuuka ewaa Tita oghu.”
Niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yesu aba baaghi̱li̱ye bati, “Hakili endindi waabu̱gha bbeni̱-bbeni̱ otaaku̱koleesi̱ya nsi̱mo.
Endindi twakimanya ngoku omani̱ye bu̱li̱ kintu kyona, kandi tookwetaaghisibuwa muntu weena ku̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bi̱bu̱u̱li̱yo. Eki kyaleki̱ye twahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku waalu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga.”
Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Naanu haakumaliilila mwahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je?”

Bhaatu bwile buli haai ku̱hi̱ka kandi bwamali̱ye ku̱hi̱ka hambali enu̱we boona mukuhanjikana, kandi bu̱li̱ omui akughenda ewe e ka. Mu̱nti̱ghe nenkaha. Bhaatu tanku̱ti̱ghala nenkaha bbaa, nanga Tita ali hamui nanje.
Naabaghambiiye bintu ebi, niikuwo haabwanu kuba mu bumui nanje mugubhe kutunga mpempa. Munsi muni mukubona-bona. Bhaatu mugume! Si̱ye naasi̱ngu̱u̱ye bu̱toki̱ bwa nsi eni.
Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi byona, aalola eghulu kandi aatandika kusaba naaghila ati,
“Tita bwile bwanje bwa kubona-bona kandi ku̱ku̱wa bwahi̱ki̱ye. Ohe Mwana waawe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa niikuwo na Mwana waawe akuhe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
Nanga okamuha bu̱toki̱ haa bantu boona niikuwo boona aba waamuhaaye abahe bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
Ekikuleka bantu mbatunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, ni kumanya ngu nuuwe Luhanga enkaha wamajima. Kandi kumanya Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu waatu̱mi̱ye.
Naakuhaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa hani munsi haabwa kumala mulimo oghu wampaaye kukola.
Tita, ompe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa endindi mu maaso ghaawe ngoku naabaagha nakiyo nsi etakabaayʼo.”
“Tita, aba wampaaye bani ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu baa nsi, naabooleki̱ye ngoku oli. Bakaba bali bantu baawe, bhaatu waabaha si̱ye, kandi endindi bakwete kighambo kyawe.
Endindi ebo bamani̱ye ngu bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki wampaaye ki̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaawe.
Nkabaghambila butumuwa obu wampaaye kandi baabu̱si̱i̱ma. Bamani̱ye kwonini ngoku naalu̱ghi̱ye ewaawe kandi baahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.
Bani niibo nkwete kusabila. Tankwete kusabila bantu baa nsi, bhaatu nkwete kusabila aba wampaaye, nanga ni bantu baawe.
Bantu boona abanje ni baawe, kandi boona abaawe ni bantu banje. Bantu aba niibo bakwolekagha ngoku ndi na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.

Si̱ye tankutodha kuukala munsi, nkwisa ewaawe, bhaatu banali munsi. Tita ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, obalinde na bu̱toki̱ bwa li̱i̱na lyawe, li̱i̱na eli wampaaye, niikuwo baakale bali mu bumui ngoku si̱ye naawe tuli mu bumui.

Obu naanabaagha nabo hani naabali̱ndi̱ye kwonini haabwa bu̱toki̱ obu wampaaye. Nkabalinda niikuwo atabʼo nʼomui oghu akubula, kuuyʼo omui oghu akughenda kuhwelekeelela ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we.
“Tita ndi haai kukuuka ewaawe, bhaatu bintu bini nkwete ku̱bi̱bu̱gha ninali munsi, niikuwo beeghesebuwa banje bani babe na kudheedhuwa kwanje kubaasulilemu kimui.
Nkabaghambila butumuwa bwawe, baabu̱si̱i̱ma, ti̱ eki kyaleka bantu baa nsi baabooha. Tabakyali bantu baa nsi, ngoku si̱ye ntali muntu wa nsi.
Tankwete kubasabila nti obaaye munsi muni, bhaatu obalinde hali omubhi.
Tabali baa munsi eni, ngoku nanje ntali wa munsi eni.
Kighambo kyawe ni kyamajima, oleke majima ghabafoole bantu baawe bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye munsi, niikuwo nanje ndimabatuma munsi.
Nkwehaayo nga kihonguwa ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwabo, niikuwo majima ghaawe ghagubhe kubafoola bantu baawe bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
“Tankwete kusabila beeghesebuwa eku̱mi̱ nʼomui bani bonkaha bbaa. Nkwete kusabila dhee boona abaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye kukwama mu butumuwa bwa beeghesebuwa bani,
nti boona babe mu bumui. Ti̱ ngoku uwe, Tita, oli muli si̱ye, kandi nanje nʼaba muli uwe, oleke nabo babe mu etu̱we, niikuwo bantu baa nsi bahi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.
Naabahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa eki wampaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa niikuwo nabo babe mu bumui ngoku naatu tuli mu bumui.

Nkubbala babe mu bumui ngoku bali mu bumui nanje kandi naawe waaba mu bumui nanje. Oleke babe mu bumui kwonini, niikuwo bantu baa nsi bamanye ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye. Oleke bamanye ngoku obaku̱ndi̱ye mu mulingo ghumui ngoku oku̱ndi̱ye si̱ye.
“Tita, nkubbala aba wampaaye kilo kimui babe nanje hambali ndi mu eghulu. Nkubbala babone ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa wampaaye, nanga okankunda otakahangi̱ye nsi.
Tita oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nankabha bantu baa nsi batakumani̱ye, si̱ye nkumani̱ye, kandi beeghesebuwa banje bamani̱ye ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.
Nkabooleka ngoku oli, kandi nkweyongela kubooleka ngoku oli. Nkukola eki niikuwo kukunda wankundiiyemu oku kubaakalemu, kandi nanje niikale muli bo.”
Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kusaba, eye hamui na beeghesebuwa be baaghenda, baabhasuka kighona kya Ki̱di̱looni̱, baahi̱ka mu musili ghwa bi̱ghu̱ma Oli̱va.
Yu̱da oghu aaghendagha ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, akaba asangu̱u̱we amani̱ye ki̱i̱kalo eki baaghendi̱yemu, nanga Yesu aasanguwagha naaghendayo na beeghesebuwa be aba.
Nahabweki Yu̱da aasa ahikiiye kiigambi̱ kya baasilikale na balemi̱ aba bakulu baa bahongi̱ na Bafali̱saayo baatu̱mi̱ye. Bantu aba baasa bakwete maataala na maatoci̱ hamui na biita bikani̱ye.
Nahabweki ngoku Yesu aabaagha amani̱ye byona ebikughenda kumubʼo, aabeebinga, aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ni ani̱ mukwete kubbala?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Tukwete kubbala Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱.”
Yesu aabaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni.” (Na Yu̱da oghu aaghendagha ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya anaamiliiyʼo).
Yesu akaba makamala kughila ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni,” du̱mbi̱ baakuukilani̱ya, beegengakaka hansi, haabwa maani̱ ghe.
Aatodha aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukwete kubbala ani̱?”
Baatodha baamukuukamu bati, “Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aabaghila ati, “Naabaghambiiye nti, ni̱i̱syoni. Ti̱ alakaba aali̱i̱syoni mukubbala, muleke abankweme bani ebo baghende.”
Aabu̱gha ebi ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi aasangu̱u̱we abu̱ghi̱ye ati, “Tita aba wampaaye taaliyo nʼomui oghu ndileka andu̱ghʼo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo oghu akaba ali na kihiyo aakibhulayo, aajombʼo mu̱heeleli̱ya wa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona kutui kwabuliyo. (Li̱i̱na lya mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu baamughilaghamu Mali̱ku̱si̱).
Bhaatu Yesu aalaghila Peetelo ati, “Ku̱u̱ki̱yayo kihiyo kyawe eki! Mbhonganuuwe kubona-bona ngoku Tita aategheki̱ye ati mbona-bone.”
Du̱mbi̱ kiigambi̱ kya baasilikale aba na mukulu wabo hamui na balemi̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, baakwata Yesu. Bamuboha
baadu̱bha baamutwala ewaa Anansi nkyame sya Kayaafa. Kayaafa oghu niiye akaba ali mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona mwaka oghu.
Kayaafa oghu niiye akasanguwa ahabuuye beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya ati nkilungi muntu omui ku̱ku̱wa haabwa bantu boona.

Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo hamui na mweghesebuwa onji baaghenda bakweme Yesu. Mweghesebuwa onji oghu, bakaba bamumani̱ye bhyani ewaa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, du̱mbi̱ aataha na Yesu hanjaakati ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona.

Bhaatu Peetelo aakala alindiiye hanja haa mulyango ghwa lugho. Mweghesebuwa oghu baabaagha bamani̱ye ewaa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, aakuuka eesengeleli̱ya manaabukali̱ oghu akaba ali̱ndi̱ye haa mulyango du̱mbi̱ aasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye Peetelo kutaahayo.
Obu aanataahagha, manaabukali̱ oghu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Naawe tooli omui mu beeghesebuwa baa musaasa oghu?”
Peetelo aakuukamu ati, “Si̱ye bbaa.”
Bwile obu, mpeu yakwatila kimui, du̱mbi̱ baheeleli̱ya aba hamui na balemi̱ baa Bayu̱daaya beemilila haai na mulilo kwota. Peetelo naye, akaba aamiliiye nabo noota.
Niibuwo mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aabu̱u̱i̱ye Yesu haa njegheesi̱ya yee, hamui na beeghesebuwa be.

Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Bu̱li̱ kilo neegheseli̱yagha mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya kandi na bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, hambali Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye bakwekumani̱li̱yagha. Ti̱ taaliyo eki naabu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱bi̱so bbaa.
Okwete ku̱mbu̱u̱li̱ya otiyo nangaaki? Obu̱u̱li̱ye abaaghu̱wagha ni̱mbu̱gha. Majima kuwo bamani̱ye ebi naabu̱ghagha.”
Obu Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye atiyo, omui mu bakulu abali beemiliyʼo aamutali̱ya haali̱i̱so. Aaghila Yesu ati, “Niikuwo okukuukaghamu otiyo mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona?”
Yesu aaghila ati, “Ndakaba ninaabu̱ghi̱ye kubhi, ohe buukai̱so obukwoleka eki naasobeei̱ye. Bhaatu ndakaba ninaabu̱ghi̱ye majima, ekyaleki̱ye wantali̱i̱ye nangaaki?”
Du̱mbi̱ Anansi aalaghila ati bamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye banamu̱bohi̱ye ewaa Kayaafa, mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona.
Obu Peetelo aabaagha eemiliiye noota mulilo, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Uwe naawe tooli omui mu beeghesebuwa baa musaasa oghu?”
Eehighaana naaghila ati, “Si̱ye bbaa.”
Omui mu baheeleli̱ya baa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, lughanda lwa musaasa oghu Peetelo aajombi̱yʼo kutui, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Tanuuwe naaboone oli na musaasa oghu mu musili ghwa biti Oli̱va?”
Peetelo aatodha eehighaana, du̱mbi̱ bwile bwonini nkoko yaakooka.

Nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱ beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baaghenda ewaa Kayaafa baayayo Yesu, baamutwala mu kikaali kya Pilaato mu̱lemi̱ Mulooma. Bhaatu baabhenga kutaaha mu kikaali kya mu̱lemi̱ oghu. Baabbalagha kuukala baneeli̱ye ewaa Luhanga kusighikila haa mi̱ghendi̱yo yabo, niikuwo bagubhe kuliya haa kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo.
Nahabweki Pilaato aatuwa aabeebinga kandi aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Musaasa oni, mukumunyeghelelʼo musango ki?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Nguli ataatu̱u̱ye musango ghwamaani̱ tatwangu̱mu̱leeti̱ye ewaawe bbaa.”
Pilaato aaghila ati, “Ngughu; mumutwale, mu̱mu̱twi̱le musango ni̱mu̱koleesi̱ya bilaghilo byanu.”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Etu̱we tatuli na bu̱toki̱ bwa ku̱twi̱la muntu weena musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa.”
Eki bikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi Yesu aasangu̱u̱we aabu̱ghi̱ye nooleka mulingo oghu aaghendagha ku̱kwi̱lamu.
Du̱mbi̱ Pilaato akuukayo aataaha mu kikaali kiye, aatodha aabilikila Yesu, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Wambu̱u̱i̱ye otiyo haabwa kweli̱li̱kana kwawe, kedha muntu onji niiye aakughambiiye ebinkwetʼo?”
Pilaato aamukuukamu ati, “Buuye si̱ye ndi Mu̱yu̱daaya? Ni bantu baawe hamui na bakulu baanu baa bahongi̱ abaakuleeti̱ye ewanje. Ti̱ uwe mbiki waakoli̱ye?”

Yesu aamughila ati, “Bukama bwanje tabuli bwa munsi muni bbaa. Nguli bwabaagha buli bwa munsi muni, baheeleli̱ya banje bangulwane na beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya bati batakwata si̱ye. Bhaatu bukama bwanje bu̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji.”
Pilaato aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Kikumani̱i̱si̱ya oli Mukama?”

Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Waahi̱ki̱i̱ye kughila oti ndi mukama. Majima kuwo eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabyaluwa kandi naasa munsi muni. Nkaasa kughambila bantu majima. Muntu weena oghu akubbalagha kumanya majima agha niiye aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha.”
Pilaato aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Majima kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ki?” Obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aatuwa, aaghila Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Bhaawai̱, musaasa oni tamboone ali na musango bbaa!
Bhaatu nkukola ngoku nkaakukolagha haa bu̱li̱ Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Nkuleka munyankomo omui oghu mukusaba muti ndekele. Buuye mukubbala ndekele Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?”
Baamukuukamu mbagolela kimui bati, “Oghu bbaa, oghu bbaa! Tukubbala olekele Balaba!” Balaba oghu bakaba bamukwete haabwa kuba muheekela.
Niibuwo Pilaato aalaghiiye baasilikale baahuula Yesu bibbooko bya minuwa.
Baasilikale aba baali̱ngelela bilandilo bya mahuwa ghajambi̱ye, baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka kiyo mu mutuwe nga sipeewa ya bukama, baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka kiigandulo kiimutuku nga mukama.
Baatandika kughenda omui-omui hambali Yesu ali kumubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya mbamughila bati, “Otuule, uwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya!” Baamutalangi̱ya haali̱i̱so.

Niibuwo Pilaato aatodhi̱ye aatuwa, aaghila ki̱bbu̱la kya Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Nkulaghila batodhe batwesi̱ye Yesu bamuleete hambali muli, niikuwo enu̱we boonini mumanye ngoku si̱ye ntaaboone ali na musango oghu aakoli̱ye.”
Obu baasilikale aba baatweseei̱ye Yesu, bamu̱lu̱wi̱ki̱ye kilandilo kya mahuwa mu mutuwe, analu̱wete kiigandulo kiimutuku nga mukama, Pilaato aaghila Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Muntu waanu ngughulaaye!”
Bakulu baa bahongi̱, na beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya makamubona, du̱mbi̱ baatandika kugolela kimui bati, “Bamubambe haa musalaba! Bamubambe!”
Bhaatu Pilaato aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we boonini mughende mumubambe, si̱ye tanaaboone ali na musango ndamu̱twi̱la.”
Bayu̱daaya aba baamukuukamu bati, “Kusighikila mu kilaghilo kyatu, Yesu oghu abhonganuuwe bamwite nanga akabu̱gha kubhi kughila ati eye ni Mwana wa Luhanga.”
Obu Pilaato aaghu̱u̱ye eki eeyongelela kimui kwobaha,
du̱mbi̱ aatodha aataaha mu kikaali kiye. Baatodha baamuleetela Yesu du̱mbi̱ aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Dhaani, olu̱ghi̱ye haa?” Bhaatu Yesu ataamukuukamu.
Pilaato aamughila ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye obhengi̱ye ku̱bu̱gha nanje? Tookimani̱ye ngoku ndi na bu̱toki̱ kulaghila nti bakulekele, kedha nti bakubambe?”
Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Bu̱toki̱ obu oli nabuwo haa si̱ye, Luhanga wʼomu eghulu niiye akuhaaye buwo. Nahabweki oghu aalaghiiye ati bandeete ewaawe niiye ali na musango ghwa kibhi kyamaani̱.”

Ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu du̱mbi̱ Pilaato aabbala kulekela Yesu, bhaatu Bayu̱daaya baagolela kimui bati, “Kaakuba olekela musaasa oghu, okuba otali bhootu̱ sya Kai̱saali̱ mu̱lemi̱ wa Looma, nanga weena oghu akweyetagha ‘Mukama’ akuba ajeemeeye Kai̱saali̱.”

Obu Pilaato aaghu̱u̱ye eki, aalaghila ati batwesi̱ya Yesu. Pilaato oghu aasitama haa kitebe kiye eki aatwi̱laghʼo misango ekyabaagha hanjaakati eghi baali baaliliiye na mabaale, (eghi mu Lulamai̱ki̱ baaghilaghamu Gabbata.)
Kilo eki kikaba kili kilo eki beeteekani̱li̱jaghamu haabwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Obu syahi̱ki̱ye haai nga saaha mukaagha sya ntangaali̱, Pilaato aaghila Bayu̱daaya aba ati,
“Mukama waanu nguni!”
Bhaatu bo baagola mbaghila bati, “Twala ye eli̱! Twala ye eli̱! Bamubambe!”
Pilaato aabaghila ati, “Buuye nilaghile babambe Mukama waanu?”
Bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba baamukuukamu bati, “Tatuli na mukama onji, kuuyʼo Kai̱saali̱ enkaha.”
Haakumaliilila Pilaato aasi̱i̱ma, aalaghila baasilikale be kubamba Yesu.
Niibuwo baasilikale baatwete Yesu.
Baaghenda bamu̱heekeei̱ye musalaba ghuwe. Baamu̱ki̱dhi̱ya mu ki̱i̱kalo bakughilaghamu “Ki̱i̱kalo kya Kahanga” (eki mu Lulamai̱ki̱ baaghilaghamu Gologota.)

Haala niiyo baamubambiiye hamui na bantu banji babili. Musalaba ghwa omui baaghu̱u̱mi̱li̱li̱ya haa luhande lwa buliyo bwa Yesu, na ghwa onji haa luhande lwabumesu, oghwa Yesu baaghu̱u̱mi̱li̱li̱ya haagati.
Pilaato aahandiika haa kabbaau musango ghwa Yesu, baakata haa musalaba aahandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo ati, “Yesu wa Najaaleeti̱, Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya.”

Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye baasoma kihandiiko eki, nanga ki̱i̱kalo hambali baabambiiye Yesu kikaba kili haai na kibugha Yelusaalemu, kandi kihandiiko eki kikaba bakihandi̱i̱ki̱ye mu mi̱bu̱ghe esatu: Lulamai̱ki̱, Lulaati̱ni̱, na Lu̱gi̱li̱ki̱.
Bakulu baa bahongi̱ baaghenda ewaa Pilaato, baamughila bati, “Otahandiika oti, ‘Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya,’ bhaatu oti, ‘Aaghi̱li̱ye ati ni Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya.’ ”
Pilaato aabakuukamu ati, “Ebi naahandi̱i̱ki̱ye, niibiyo naahandi̱i̱ki̱ye.”

Haanu̱ma ya baasilikale kubamba Yesu haa musalaba, baatambulani̱yamu ngoye siye bi̱twi̱ke bbinaa, bu̱li̱ omui aatwalʼo kimui. Bhaatu eki aali alu̱wete mukati kikaba ki̱koleeu̱we mu lughoye lukwataane ku̱lu̱gha haa bikiya ku̱hi̱ka mu malu̱.
Baaghambilana bati, “Luni tutalutemula, muleke tukome buluulu niikuwo tumanye oghu akulutwala. Eki kikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebikughilagha ngu,
“Bakatambulana bi̱lu̱walo byanje,
baabikomela buluulu kumanya oghu akubitwala.”
Nahabweki niikuwo baasilikale aba baakoli̱ye batiyo.
Ni̱na Yesu na mwana waani̱na ni̱na Yesu, hamui na Mali̱ya mukaa Ku̱lyopa kandi na Mali̱ya Mangadhalina, bakaba baamiliiye haai na musalaba oghu baabambi̱yʼo Yesu.
Obu Yesu aaboone ni̱na wee aamiliiyʼo hamui na mweghesebuwa wa Yesu oghu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye naye aamiliiye haai, aaghila ni̱na wee ati, “Mutabani̱ waawe ngughu.”
Aaghila mweghesebuwa oghu ati, “Njoko waawe ngughu.” Du̱mbi̱ ku̱lu̱gha kilo eki mweghesebuwa oghu aatwala ni̱na Yesu ewe e ka kumulinda.
Yesu aamanya ngoku aamali̱ye mulimo aasi̱ye kukola. Ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ekyasangu̱u̱we kili mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we, Yesu aaghila ati, “Eliyo linkwete.”

Hakaba haliyo haala, kanagha kalimu vi̱i̱ni̱ esaali̱ye, nahabweki baasilikale aba baalu̱bi̱ka kijibankoba mu vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi baakita haa kati baaghilaghamu hai̱sopu̱ baaki̱ni̱i̱ni̱ya Yesu haa mu̱nu̱wa kunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi.
Obu aanooyʼo, aaghila ati, “Kyahooye.” Du̱mbi̱ aatu̱li̱ka mutuwe, aaku̱wa.

Bayu̱daaya bakaba batabbali̱ye kilo kya Sabhato ku̱hi̱ka mi̱ku̱ ya bantu baabambi̱ye kilo eki enali haa misalaba. Kilo eki kikaba kili Kilo kya Kweteekani̱ya, nanga ekyalabhi̱yaghʼo kyaghendagha kuba kilo kya Sabhato kandi na kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Nahabweki baasaba Pilaato kubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kuhenanga bantu abali haa misalaba maghulu niikuwo baayo mi̱ku̱ yabo Sabhato etakahi̱ki̱ye.
Baasilikale baasa baadu̱bha baahenda maghulu ghaa bantu babili aba baabambi̱ye hamui na Yesu.
Bhaatu obu baahi̱ki̱yʼo Yesu, baasanga naamali̱ye ku̱ku̱wa, bataamuhenda maghulu.
Bhaatu omui mu baasilikale aba aatu̱bhi̱ta Yesu nʼeti̱mu̱ mu mbalu̱, ti̱ saghama hamui na maasi byasendela kimui.

Si̱ye, Yohaana, ni̱i̱si̱ye neenini nkabona bini, kandi nimani̱ye ebi nkwete kuhandiika ngoku ghali majima. Nimani̱ye ngoku nkwete ku̱bu̱gha majima, kandi nkwete ku̱bu̱gha ebi niikuwo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je buukai̱so obu nkwete kuha haa Yesu.
Yesu kutamuhenda maghulu kikaasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, “Eku̱wa liye na limui tabalilihenda,”
kandi ngoku Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye hanji dhee biti, “Balimulola eenini oghu baatu̱bhi̱ti̱ye.”

Haanu̱ma ya ebi, Yojeefu̱ wʼomu kyalo kya Alimateya aaghenda ewaa Pilaato. Yojeefu̱ oghu akaba ali mweghesebuwa wa Yesu, bhaatu taabbalagha bantu kumanya eki haabwa kwobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya. Aasaba Pilaato mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu kughujiika. Pilaato aamu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya, du̱mbi̱ Yojeefu̱ oghu aaghuuya haa musalaba.

Yojeefu̱ aaghenda ewaa Pilaato ali hamui na Nikodemu oghu akaasa ewaa Yesu mukilo. Nikodemu oghu aasa alungani̱i̱ye nsyano esasi̱ye na bigita bisasi̱ye baaghilaghamu miila. Bintu ebi bikaba bi̱hi̱ki̱ye ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ asatu.
Batwala mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu, baaghuboha mu si̱i̱ti̱ njelu mpyaka baataayemu bigita ebi, ngoku asi̱li̱ ya Bayu̱daaya yaalaghilagha kujiika muntu.
Haai na hambali baabambiiye Yesu, musili ghukaba ghuliyo kandi ghulimu kituulo kihyaka eki batakaji̱i̱ki̱yemu muntu.
Haabwa kilo eki kuba eki Bayu̱daaya beeteekani̱jagha haabwa kilo kya Sabhato, kandi na kituulo eki kusanguwa kili haai-haai, du̱mbi̱ baalangaali̱yamu mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu.
Kilo Kyasande nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱ butakakeeye, Mali̱ya Mangadhalina aakeelela haa kituulo, aasanga ebaale baabaagha bataaye haa mulyango ghwa kituulo eki litaliyo, mbaali̱i̱hi̱yʼo.

Aaghenda naali̱gi̱ta hambali Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo na mweghesebuwa oli̱, oghu Yesu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye, baabaagha. Aabaghila ati, “Mu̱ku̱ ghwa Mukama baaghu̱u̱hi̱ye mu kituulo, kandi tatumani̱ye hambali baamutaaye!”
Peetelo na mweghesebuwa muunakiye oli̱, baatuwa, baatandika kughenda haa kituulo.
Bombi baaghenda mbali̱gi̱ta, bhaatu mweghesebuwa oli̱ eye aati̱gha Peetelo, aadu̱bha ku̱ki̱dha haa kituulo.
Aahi̱ka aagomba aalangi̱li̱li̱yamu, aabona ngoye esi baabaagha babohi̱yemu mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu, sili ngaala, bhaatu ataataaha mu kituulo.
Du̱mbi̱ Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo oghu akaba ati̱ghaaye enu̱ma naye aaki̱dha, aahi̱ka aataaha mu kituulo. Aabona ngoye sili haala,
hamui na lughoye olu baabaagha babohi̱ye Yesu mu mutuwe. Eluwo lukaba balu̱ku̱niiye kaati, lutali hamui nʼolu baabaagha bamu̱bohi̱yemu.
Haakumaliilila na mweghesebuwa oghu akadu̱bha ku̱ki̱dha haa kituulo, naye dhee aataahamu. Obu aaboone Yesu atalimu, aahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku Yesu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye.
Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo na mweghesebuwa oghu, bakaba batakeetegheeleei̱ye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebyaghilagha biti Yesu abhonganuuwe ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka mu baku̱u̱ye.
Du̱mbi̱ beeghesebuwa aba baakuukayo mu maka ghaabo,
bhaatu Mali̱ya aati̱ghala haa kituulo haala naalila. Mali̱ya oghu naanalila, aagomba aalola mu kituulo.
Aabona baamalai̱ka babili balu̱wete ngoye sijelu, basitami̱ye hambali baabaagha balangaai̱ye mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu. Omui ali mu maghulu eku̱wa na onji ali ebulimutuwe.
Baamughila bati, “Mukali̱ uwe, okwete kulila nangaaki?”
Aabakuukamu ati, “Baatwete Mukama wanje, kandi tanimani̱ye hambali baamutaaye!”
Du̱mbi̱ makeegaaliya ati, aabona Yesu aamiliiye ngaala, bhaatu ataamumaniilila ngoku ali Yesu.
Yesu aamughila ati, “Mukali̱ uwe, okwete kulila nangaaki? Ni ani̱ okwete kubbala?”
Mali̱ya aamanya ati musaasa oghu niiye mu̱koli̱ wa musili oghu, du̱mbi̱ aamughila ati, “Wai̱tu̱, gutu, olakaba aaniiwe waamu̱u̱hi̱yemu, onjoleke hambali waamutaaye, nkumutwala.”
Yesu aamughila ati, “Mali̱ya!”
Du̱mbi̱ Mali̱ya eegaali̱ya, aaguga mu mu̱bu̱ghe ghwabo ghwa Lulamai̱ki̱ ati, “Labbooni̱,” (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya, Mwegheesi̱ya.)
Yesu aamughila ati, “Otankwatʼo, nanga tankaku̱u̱ki̱ye ewaa Tita. Oghende oghambile baghenji̱ banje oti, ‘Nkukuuka ewaa Tita kandi Eseenu̱we, ewaa Luhanga wanje kandi Luhanga waanu.’ ”
Mali̱ya Mangadhalina du̱mbi̱ aaghenda aaghambila beeghesebuwa makulu agha ati, “Naaboone Mukama waatu!” Aabaghambila ebi Yesu aamughambiiye kubaghambila.

Kilo Kyasande eki lwagholo, beeghesebuwa baa Yesu bakaba beekumaani̱i̱ye hamui, beehighaliiye mu numba haabwa kwobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, Yesu aasa aamilila haagati yabo, aabaghila ati, “Mpempa yonkaha!”
Obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aabooleka ngalo siye na bighele biye. Ti̱, beeghesebuwa aba obu baaboone Mukama Yesu baadheedheluwa kimui.
Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Mpempa yonkaha! Tita ngoku antu̱mi̱ye niikuwo nanje ndimabatuma.”
Du̱mbi̱ aabahuuhila lwoha, aaghila ati, “Mutunge Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Oghu mulaghanilagha bibhi biye, na Luhanga alamughanilagha biyo. Bhaatu oghu mulabhengagha kughanila bibhi biye, na Luhanga taalamughanilagha biyo bbaa.”
Bwile obu, Tomasi, (oghu baaghilaghamu Mulongo), omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu eku̱mi̱ na babili, akaba atali hamui na baanakiye aba obu baaboone Yesu.
Haanu̱ma ya kubona Yesu, beeghesebuwa baanakiye baamughambila bati, “Twaboone Mukama waatu!”

Bhaatu eye aabaghila ati, “Si̱ye ntaaboone nkolu̱ sya mi̱si̱maali eghi baamukonkomeleeye mu ngalo, kandi nta kyala mu nkolu̱ ya mu mbalu̱ hambali baamu̱tu̱bhi̱ti̱ye, tanku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nti aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye bbaa.”

Haanu̱ma ya wi̱i̱ki̱ emui, beeghesebuwa aba baatodha beekumaani̱li̱ya hamui mu numba. Bwile obu na Tomasi akaba ali hamui nabo. Nankabha njighi nsyabaagha siighaaye, Yesu aasa aabaamilila haagati aabaghila ati, “Mpempa yonkaha.”
Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Tomasi, wiise ote kyala kyawe mu nkolu̱ sya mu ngalo syanje sini, nʼomu mbalu̱ syanje muni. Oleke kughuluka-ghu̱lu̱ki̱ya, bhaatu ohi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱.”
Tomasi aaghila ati, “Nuuwe Mukama kandi Luhanga wanje!”
Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aamughila ati, “Kumbona niikuwo kwaleka waahi̱ki̱li̱ja? Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abaku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱jagha batamboone.”
Yesu akakola byakulolelʼo byakuswekani̱ya binji bikani̱ye ebi beeghesebuwa be banaboone, ebitahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kini.
Bhaatu bini bihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we niikuwo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku Yesu ali Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga, kandi haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja oku, mutunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ mu eye.
Niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baatodhi̱ye baamubona bali haa nanja ya Ti̱bbeli̱yo.

Beeghesebuwa aba niibo bani: Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo, Tomasi (oghu baaghilaghamu Mulongo), Nasanai̱li̱ oghu akaba alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kaana mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo, na beeghesebuwa banji babili, boona bakaba bali hamui.
Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aabaghila ati, “Ndimaghenda kukomana nsu̱i̱.”
Baamughila bati, “Naatu tukughenda naawe.” Du̱mbi̱ baani̱i̱na bwati̱, bhaatu bwile bwakiya kuwo batakwete na kantu.
Nkyambisi, Yesu aasa aamilila haa ki̱si̱yo, bhaatu beeghesebuwa aba bataakenga ngoku ali Yesu.
Niibuwo aababilikiiye ati, “Bhaawai̱, tamukakwete na nsu̱i̱ yoona?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Bbaa!”
Aabaghila ati, “Mukube kati̱mba kaanu luhande lwabuliyo lwa bwati̱ bwanu, mukukwatiya nsu̱i̱.” Obu baakoli̱ye kuwo, kati̱mba kaabasaagha na kubhula nanga kakaba kakwate nsu̱i̱ sikaniiye kimui.

Niibuwo mweghesebuwa oghu Yesu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye aaghi̱li̱ye Peetelo ati, “Ni Mukama waatu!” Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo eeboha kooti̱ mu mi̱ghelu̱ eghi aabaagha eehi̱i̱yemu obu aakomanagha, du̱mbi̱ aahalala eehuula mu maasi kwebinga Yesu.
Na beeghesebuwa baanakiye baamukwama mbanabhulaaga kati̱mba aka. Bwati̱ obu bukaba buli haai nga mi̱ta ki̱ku̱mi̱ ku̱lu̱gha haa ki̱si̱yo.
Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye haa ki̱si̱yo baasangaana makala ngaakamu mulilo kandi mbookeli̱yʼo nsu̱i̱, basu̱ndi̱i̱ye na migaati̱ haakpengbu̱ ngaala.
Yesu aabaghila ati, “Muleete simui haa nsu̱i̱ mwakwati̱i̱ye.”

Du̱mbi̱ Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aani̱i̱na mu bwati̱ aabhula kati̱mba aka, aaki̱hi̱ki̱ya haa ki̱si̱yo. Kakaba kaasuuyemu nsu̱i̱ siinamu̱li̱to ki̱ku̱mi̱ ataano nʼesatu, bhaatu nankabha nkaabaaghamu nsu̱i̱ sikaniiye kimui esi takaagu̱bhi̱ye ku̱twi̱ka.

Niibuwo Yesu aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mwise, muliye kya nkyambisi.” Ti̱ taabaayʼo nʼomui mu beeghesebuwa be aba oghu akalengʼo ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe ani̱?” Nanga boona bakaba bamani̱ye ngoku ali Mukama Yesu eenini.
Yesu aakwata mugaati̱ hamui na nsu̱i̱ aabiha beeghesebuwa be aba.
Oghu niighuwo ghwabaaye mulundi ghwa kasatu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu kumubona haanu̱ma yee ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka mu baku̱u̱ye.
Obu baamali̱ye kuliya, niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo ati, “Si̱mooni̱, mutabani̱ wa Yohaana, onku̱ndi̱ye kusaali̱ya bani boona?”
Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Ee Mukama wanje, omani̱ye ngoku nku̱ku̱ndi̱ye.”
Yesu aamughila ati, “Ololeelele byana bya ntaama syanje.”
Yesu aatodha aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Si̱mooni̱, mutabani̱ wa Yohaana, majima kuwo onku̱ndi̱ye?”
Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, Mukama wanje, omani̱ye ngoku nku̱ku̱ndi̱ye.”
Yesu aamughila ati, “Ololeelele ntaama syanje.”
Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya Peetelo mulundi ghwa kasatu ati, “Si̱mooni̱, mutabani̱ wa Yohaana, onku̱ndi̱ye?”
Peetelo eehi̱ghu̱wa atuntuuye haabwa Yesu ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya mulundi ghwakasatu ati, “Onku̱ndi̱ye?”
Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, uwe omani̱ye bintu byona. Omani̱ye ngoku nku̱ku̱ndi̱ye.”
Yesu aamughila ati, “Oli̱i̱si̱ye ntaama syanje.

Nkughambiiye majima ghoonini, obu waabaagha onali mwana, weenini weebohagha mu̱ci̱pi̱ ghwawe, olu̱wala oli na bughabe kughenda hambali obbali̱ye. Bhaatu obu waaku̱li̱ye, olahaaghayo mikono yaawe, muntu onji akubohe akutwale hambali otabbali̱ye.”
Yesu aabu̱gha atiyo kwoleka mulingo Peetelo aku̱ku̱wa kuha Luhanga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aaghila Peetelo ati, “Ookale onankwamiliiye.”

Peetelo eegaali̱ya, aabona mweghesebuwa oghu Yesu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye abakweme. (Niiye oghu akaba asitami̱ye haai na Yesu haa kiihulo, oghu akamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama waatu, ni ani̱ aku̱ku̱ghobeli̱ya?”)
Obu Peetelo aamuboone du̱mbi̱ aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Mukama wanje ti̱ oghu eye mbiki bikumubʼo?”
Yesu aamughila ati, “Ninaabbali̱ye nti aakale ali mwomi̱i̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nku̱u̱ki̱ye, eki kikukwetʼo ki? Uwe onkwame.”

Obu beeghesebuwa be baaghu̱u̱ye eki, baatandika kughambilana ngoku mweghesebuwa oghu atali̱ku̱wa. Bhaatu Yesu taaghi̱li̱ye ati mweghesebuwa oghu taali̱ku̱wa, akaghila Peetelo ati, “Ninaabbali̱ye nti aakale ali mwomi̱i̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nku̱u̱ki̱ye, eki kikukwetʼo ki?”
Mweghesebuwa oghu ni oghu akuhaagha buukai̱so bwa bintu ebi byona ebi aaboone kandi oghu akabihandiika mu kitabo kini. Kandi tumani̱ye ngoku bintu byona aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ngoku ghali majima ghoonini.
Yesu akakola bintu binji bikani̱ye dhee. Nguli byona baabihandi̱i̱ki̱ye, nku̱gu̱mi̱ya nankabha munsi yoona tabangu̱tu̱ngi̱ye mwanya ghwa kubiikilamu bitabo baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ebi byona bbaa.
Wai̱ Ti̱yofi̱lo, mu kitabo naadu̱bhi̱ye kukuhandiikila,
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kilo eki aani̱i̱ni̱ye mu eghulu, haanu̱ma ya kulaghila bakwenda be aakomi̱ye ebi bakukola, haabwa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la obu Yesu aaboona-boone, naaku̱wa, aamala bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa naanaboneka mu bakwenda be aba bwile bwona. Aabonekagha mu milingo ekani̱ye, niikuwo bamanile kimui ngoku aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye. Aabasoboololagha haa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
Obu aanabaagha nabo, aabaghila ati, “Mutalu̱gha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu. Mulinde eki naabaghambiiyʼo, eki Tita aabalaghiisani̱i̱ye.
Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabati̱jagha na maasi, bhaatu mu bilo bikee mukubati̱i̱ji̱buwa na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
Obu bakwenda aba baatodhi̱ye kusanga-sangaana na Yesu, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mukama, buni niibuwo bwile waasi̱ye ku̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bu̱lemi̱?”
Aabaghila ati, “Eki takili kyanu kumanya bwile obu Tita aataayʼo haabwa bu̱toki̱ buwe.
Bhaatu mukutunga maani̱ Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye naabaasi̱yʼo, tooli̱ mukuba baakai̱so banje mu Yelusaalemu, Bu̱yu̱daaya, Samali̱ya, na bi̱i̱kalo byona byʼomunsi yoona.”
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aani̱i̱na mu eghulu banamu̱loli̱ye, kicu kyamu̱swi̱ki̱la baaleka kumubona.
Obu baabaagha banaloleleeye kimui eghulu ngoku akwete kughenda, beetu̱lakaka basaasa babili babeemiliiye haakpengbu̱ nga haala, balu̱wete nkanji̱ sijelu dhiyo.
Baabu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Enu̱we Banagalilaaya, munaloli̱ye eghulu nangaaki? Yesu oghu mwaboone naani̱i̱na mu eghulu, alikuuka ngoku mwamuboone naaghenda.”
Bakwenda aba baalu̱gha haa mwena Oli̱va, baakuuka Yelusaalemu. Mwena oghu ghulabhaane na Yelusaalemu, haai nga ki̱lomi̱ta emui.

Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, baaghenda mu kisiika kya kai̱na yaakabili, hambali baabaagha baghooneeye. Bakwenda aba ni: Peetelo, Yohaana, Yakobbo, Andeleya, Fi̱li̱po, Tomasi, Batu̱lu̱maayo, Matayo, Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa Alifaayo, Si̱mooni̱ oghu aalwanililagha ehanga liye, na Yu̱da mutabani̱ wa Yakobbo.
Bakwenda aba hamui na Mali̱ya ni̱na Yesu, baana baani̱na Yesu,
Bwile obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja haai nga ki̱ku̱mi̱ nʼabili baagumbaana. Peetelo aamilila kubabu̱ghi̱la naaghila ati,
“Baana baamaaha, ebi Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱bu̱ghi̱ye byabaaye kuwo. Ebi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aabu̱ghi̱ye kukwama mu Dhau̱dhi̱ ku̱bu̱ghʼo Yu̱da oghu akaleeta abaasi̱ye kukwata Yesu.
Yu̱da oghu naye akaba atulimu, kandi akomeeu̱we kukola naatu mulimo ghuni.”
(Sente esi aatu̱ngi̱ye haabwa kibhi kiye, aaghulamu musili hambali eeni̱ghi̱i̱ye. Aakasuuka, eegenga, aahu̱u̱li̱ka mala ghaamugbunduuka.
Bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu boona baaghu̱wa makulu agha. Mu Lulamai̱ki̱ musili oghu bakughughilaghamu Hakaladama, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya Musili ghwa Saghama.)
Peetelo aatodha aaghila ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kya Jabbu̱li̱ ngu,
“ ‘Oleke numba yee ebe ki̱hu̱ma,
tooli̱ muntu atalitodha kughiikalamu.’
Mu ki̱twi̱ke kinji kyaghila kiti,
“ ‘Muntu onji atwale mulimo ghuwe.’
Nahabweki, tukwetaaghisibuwa kukoma muntu oghu aaghendagha naatu bwile bwona obu Mukama Yesu aamali̱ye naatu.
Abhonganuuwe kuba oghu akatandika obu Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabati̱i̱je Yesu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu aani̱i̱ni̱ye mu eghulu. Niikuwo naye abe kai̱so hamui naatu kughambila bantu haa ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwa Yesu.”
Du̱mbi̱ baahaayo mali̱i̱na ghaa bantu babili: Mati̱ya na Balasaba Yojeefu̱, oghu bantu banji baaghilaghamu Yu̱si̱to.
Niibuwo baasabi̱ye bati, “Mukama omani̱ye mitima ya bantu boona. Mu bantu babili bani otwolekemu oghu waakomi̱yemu,
ku̱heeleli̱ya kandi kuba mukwenda mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Yu̱da, oghu akatu̱lu̱ghʼo aatunga ekyali kimusemeleeye.”
Du̱mbi̱ baakoma buluulu, kumanya oghu Luhanga aakomi̱yemu. Mati̱ya aakomuwa, aaba mukwenda hamui na bali̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼomui.
Obu kilo kya Pentekooti̱ kyahi̱ki̱ye, bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona bakaba beekumaani̱li̱i̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kimui.
Du̱mbi̱ ki̱ku̱ku̱mo nga kya mwegha ghwamaani̱ kyalu̱gha mu eghulu, kyasula mu numba eghi baabaaghamu.
Baabona bintu bi̱su̱si̱ye nga bilimi bya mulilo; byebaghani̱jamu byaghendʼo bu̱li̱ omui.
Abaabaaghamu boona baasula Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye du̱mbi̱ baatandika ku̱bu̱gha mu mi̱bu̱ghe eghi etali yabo, ngoku Mwoyo oghu aabagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱i̱ye.
Bwile obu mu Yelusaalemu hakaba haliyo Bayu̱daaya abaalami̱yagha Luhanga bwile bwona, bakaba balu̱ghi̱ye mu mahanga ghaa munsi yoona.
Obu baaghu̱u̱ye ki̱ku̱ku̱mo eki, ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu bakaniiye kimui kyekumaani̱ya. Ti̱ bu̱li̱ muntu aaswekela kimui ku̱u̱ghu̱wa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba mbabu̱gha mu̱bu̱ghe ghwʼewaabo.
Haabwa kusweka oku, baaghila bati, “Dhaani abakwete ku̱bu̱gha aba boona, tabali Banagalilaaya?
Haabwaki tu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye mbabu̱gha mu mi̱bu̱ghe yʼewaatu?
Hani tuliyo abalu̱ghi̱ye mu Paati̱ya, Meedi̱ya, Elaamu, Mesopotami̱ya, Bu̱yu̱daaya, Kapadoki̱ya, Ponto, Asi̱ya,
Fi̱li̱gi̱ya, Panfu̱li̱ya, Mi̱si̱li̱, na bi̱twi̱ke bya Li̱bbi̱ya ebilabhaane na Kilene. Tuliyo bi̱bbu̱la bibili bya bantu abalu̱ghi̱ye Looma:
Bayu̱daaya, na bantu banji abaahindukiiye mu di̱i̱ni̱ ya Ki̱yu̱daaya. Na banji balu̱ghi̱ye Ku̱leete na Buhalabbu. Tubaaghu̱u̱ye mbabu̱gha mu mi̱bu̱ghe yaatu bintu byamaani̱ ebi Luhanga aakoli̱ye.”
Ti̱ abaabaaghʼo boona, baasweka kandi baasobeluwa, mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Kini nkiki bhaawai̱?”
Bhaatu banji baasekeelela bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba mbaghila bati, “Batamiiye.”

Peetelo aamilila hamui na bakwenda baanakiye eku̱mi̱ nʼomui, aatandika kutebeja ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Enu̱we boona Bayu̱daaya baanakyanje na boona abali mu Yelusaalemu, dhaani mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye bhyani.
Bamui mu enu̱we mukwete kughila muti bantu bani batamiiye, bhaatu tabatamiiye bbaa, sinali saaha esatu sya nkyambisi.
Ebikwete kulehukana bini byona, ni ebi mulangi̱ Yoweeli̱ aalangi̱ye ati,
“Luhanga aaghila ati, ‘Mpelo etakahi̱ki̱ye,
ndiseesa Mwoyo wanje haa bantu boona.
Batabani̱ na bahala baanu balilangilila,
batabhana baanu balibonekeluwa,
basaasa bakulu baliloota bilooto.
Na baheeleli̱ya banje boobukali̱ na boobusaasa,
ndibaseesʼo Mwoyo wanje mu bilo ebi,
kandi balilangilila.
Ndikola byakuswekani̱ya mu eghulu,
kandi bubonelo munsi,
halibʼo saghama, mulilo, na mwi̱ka ghwamaani̱.
Musana ghulifooka mweli̱ma,
kandi kweli̱ kulifooka saghama.
Ebi bilibʼo kilo kyamaani̱ kandi kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Mukama kitahi̱ki̱ye.
Kandi weena oghu alibilikila
li̱i̱na lya Mukama, alijunuwa.’

Peetelo aatodha aaghila ati, “Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanje, mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye! Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ akaba ali kuwo muntu oghu Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye, nanga Luhanga akabooleka bbeni̱-bbeni̱ byakuswekani̱ya na bubonelo ebi aakolagha kukwamila mu Yesu oghu. Naanu boonini bintu ebi mubimani̱ye, nanga byabonekelagha ewaanu hani.
Luhanga akaba naasangu̱u̱we ategheki̱ye hambele ati Yesu bakumuhaayʼo kumwita. Bhaatu musango ghwa kumwita ni ghwanu, nanga mukaaghu̱wana na bantu babhi kumubamba haa musalaba.
Bhaatu Luhanga aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la, aamuuya mu busaali̱ji̱ obwaleki̱ye aaku̱wa. Lu̱ku̱ talwangu̱gu̱bhi̱ye kuukala lumuboheleeye.
Dhau̱dhi̱ akamu̱bu̱ghʼo ati,
“ ‘Bwile bwona nkuukalagha mboone Mukama.
Nanga ali haa mukono ghwanje ghwabuliyo,
tankutukumila bbaa.
Nahabweki mutima ghwanje ghu̱dheedheeu̱we
kandi niibuwo naalimba haabwa kudheedhuwa.
Ndaakalagha ndi na kunihila,
nanga tookundeka Eku̱li̱mu̱,
kandi tookuleka oghu Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye waawe naagu̱nda.
Waaleki̱ye naamanya bihanda bya bwomi̱i̱li̱,
Okunjikali̱ya ndheedheeu̱we mu maaso ghaawe.’
Peetelo aaghila ati, “Baana baamaaha, taata waatu Dhau̱dhi̱ teebu̱ghaghʼo nanga akaku̱wa baamujiika, nʼendindi kituulo kiye kili ewaatu hani.
Bhaatu haabwa kuba mulangi̱, aamanya eki Luhanga aalahiiye naalaghaana naye ati alikoma omui mu baasukulu be, kuba mu̱lemi̱ ngoku aabaagha alemi̱ye.
Dhau̱dhi̱ aamanya kandi aabu̱gha haa ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwa Ki̱li̱si̱to ati Luhanga taaleki̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to wee Eku̱li̱mu̱ mu baku̱wa, kandi mu̱ku̱ ghuwe taghwagu̱ndi̱ye.
Etu̱we tuli baakai̱so kubaghambila majima ngu Luhanga aahu̱mbu̱u̱ye Yesu oghu.

Nʼendindi asitami̱ye mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa Luhanga. Ese wee Luhanga aamu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye kututumila Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye. Yesu niiye aatuhaaye Mwoyo oghu. Eki niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye nʼebi muboone bikwete kubʼo.
Dhau̱dhi̱ taani̱i̱ni̱ye mu eghulu, kusa aaghila ati,
“ ‘Mukama aaghila Mukama wanje ati,
“Ositame haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwanje
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndifoola ngi̱ghu̱ syawe
katebe kaa bighele byawe.” ’
Peetelo aatodha aaghila ati, “Nahabweki enu̱we boona bantu bʼomu I̱saaleeli̱, mukimanyile kimui ngoku Yesu oghu mwabambi̱ye haa musalaba, Luhanga akamufoola Mukama kandi Ki̱li̱si̱to.”
Obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, mitima yaabasaalila munda. Baabu̱u̱li̱ya Peetelo na bakwenda baanakiye bati, “Baana baamaaha tukole ki?”
Peetelo aabaghila ati, “Mwekuukemu, kandi mubati̱i̱ji̱bu̱we, bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we, mu li̱i̱na lya Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to haabwa kughaniluwa bibhi byanu. Mukutunga kisembo kya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Ndaghaano eghi ni yaanu na baana baanu, kandi na boona abanaseli̱yeyo, aba Mukama waatu Luhanga akubilikila kumwisʼo boona.”
Peetelo aatodha aabaghambila bintu binji bikani̱ye. Aabahanuulila ati, “Baana baamaaha mbeesengeleei̱ye, mwejune kifubilo eki Luhanga akuha bantu babhi boona!”
Ti̱ boona abaasi̱i̱mi̱ye butumuwa obu, baabati̱i̱ji̱buwa. Kandi kilo eki, muhendo ghwa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja ghweyongelʼo haai nga bantu nku̱mi̱ esatu.
Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba baataaghʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo haa njegheesi̱ya ya bakwenda, kuukala mu bumui, kusembela, kandi kusaba.
Bantu boona baahu̱ti̱yagha Luhanga haabwa byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye ebi bakwenda aba baakolagha.
Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba boona baakalagha hamui, kandi na bintu byabo byona baabitambulana hamui.
Baaghu̱li̱yagha bimui haa bibanja na bintu byabo, sente esi baayaghamu, baasitambulanagha boona, baha bu̱li̱ muntu ngoku aabbalagha.
Bakaba bali mu bumui, bu̱li̱ kilo boona baalami̱li̱yagha hamui mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga. Baasembelagha kandi baaliilagha mu maka ghaa baanakyabo badheedheeu̱we, babhasilaane,
mbasinda Luhanga bwile bwona. Bantu boona baabeeli̱li̱kanaghʼo ngoku bali balungi. Bu̱li̱ kilo Mukama ongelagha haa muhendo ghwabo, bantu abaajunuwagha.
Kilo kimui Peetelo na Yohaana baaghendagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga saaha mwenda sya ntangaali̱, bwile obu bantu baalami̱li̱yaghamu.
Baabona baheeki̱ye musaasa oghu akabyaluwa alamaaye mbamutwala hʼelembo, eli bakughilaghamu Elembo Lisemeeye, niikuwo asaba-sabe bantu abaaghendagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga.
Obu aaboone Peetelo na Yohaana bali haai kutaaha, aabasaba ati bamuhe sente.
Baamulola tonono, Peetelo aamughila ati, “Wai̱, otulole!”
Nahabweki musaasa oghu aabalolela kimui, neeli̱li̱kana ati bakumuha kantu.
Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Tandi na sente! Bhaatu ndimakuha eki ndi nakiyo. Nkulaghiiye mu li̱i̱na lya Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱, oomuke, olubhatange.”
Aamukwata haa mukono ghwabuliyo, aamu̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya, du̱mbi̱ maghulu ghaa musaasa oghu ghoomiila.
Aamatuka, aamilila, aatandika kulubhatanga. Aaghenda nabo mu Numba ya Luhanga, naalubhatanga, naahalalani̱ya, kandi naasinda Luhanga.
Bantu boona abaabaaghamu baamubona naalubhatanga kandi naasinda Luhanga.
Obu baamumaniliiye ngu ni mulema oghu aakalagha asitami̱ye hʼElembo Lisemeeye lya Numba ya Luhanga naasaba-saba bantu, boona baaswekela kimui haabwa ekyamubaayo.

Musaasa oghu aadheedheluwa kimui, ti̱ aakala aneeboheleeye Peetelo na Yohaana mu bbalaaji eghi bakughilaghamu Bbalaaji ya Solomooni̱. Bantu boona baali̱gi̱tayo baabagumba, baakala basweki̱ye kubona aki̱li̱ye kandi naahalala.

Obu Peetelo aaboone ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu kyekumani̱i̱ye, aabaghila ati, “Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanje, ekyabaayo musaasa oni kibaswekani̱i̱ye nangaaki? Mutuloleleeye bwaki, ngʼoghu oti maani̱ ghaatu kedha bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱le bwatu niibiyo byaleki̱ye twaki̱li̱ya musaasa oni?

Luhanga wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Luhanga wa I̱saka, kandi Luhanga wa Yakobbo, niiye aahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa mu̱heeleli̱ya wee Yesu, oghu mwahaayeyo muti bamwite kandi mwamwehighaana mu maaso ghaa Pilaato nankabha naabbalagha kumulekela.
Mukabhenga Alukwela kandi Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, mwasaba kubalekeelela mu̱ji̱ndi̱.
Mukaleka baata oghu akuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱, bhaatu Luhanga aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la. Eki niikiyo tukwete kuheela buukai̱so.

Musaasa muboone kandi mumani̱ye oni, bu̱toki̱ bwa Yesu bwonkaha niibuwo bwaleki̱ye aakila. Kandi haabwatu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye musaasa oni aakilila kimui ngoku enu̱we boona mumuboone.
“Nahabweki baana baamaaha, haabwa kutamanya ngoku Yesu aaniiye Ki̱li̱si̱to niikiyo kyaleki̱ye enu̱we na beebembeli̱ baanu mwamuhaayo kumwita.
Bhaatu Luhanga akaba naalangi̱ye hambele obu aatu̱mi̱ye balangi̱ be kulanga bati Ki̱li̱si̱to akwisa kubona-bona kandi ku̱ku̱wa.
Nahabweki mwekuukemu, mukuukʼo Luhanga, niikuwo abaghanile bibhi byanu,
niikuwo bwile bwanu bwa kutunga maani̱ bugubhe ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Mukama kandi abatumile Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu aasangu̱u̱we aghi̱li̱ye ati akubaasamu. Oghu niiye Yesu.
Bhaatu akulaghiluwa ku̱du̱bha kuukala mu eghulu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Luhanga akoli̱ye bintu byona buhyaka ngoku aatu̱mi̱ye balangi̱ be baa hambele bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kulanga.
Nanga Musa akaghila ati, ‘Mukama Luhanga alikoma mu baghenji̱ baanu mulangi̱ ngʼanje. Mukulaghiluwa ku̱tegheeleli̱ya byona ebi akubaghambila kukola.’
Ti̱, ‘Weena oghu alabhengagha ku̱tegheeleli̱ya mulangi̱ oghu, Luhanga alamuuyagha mu bantu be kandi ahwelekeelelaghe.’
Balangi̱ boona abaabaagha na butumuwa bwa Luhanga, otaayemu Samwi̱li̱ hamui nʼabaasi̱ye haanu̱ma yee, bakalanga dhee bintu ebikwete kubʼo bini.

Majima ni̱i̱nu̱we aba Luhanga aaghambiiye balangi̱ be ku̱bu̱ghʼo. Kandi muli mu ndaghaano eghi aakoleeye baataata baanu, naaghila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, ‘Kandi mu baasukulu baawe niimuwo nkuheela nganda sya munsi yoona mu̱gi̱sa!’

Peetelo aatodha aabaghila ati, “Luhanga atakahaaye bantu banji boona mu̱gi̱sa, enu̱we Bayu̱daaya ni̱i̱nu̱we aadu̱bhi̱ye kutumila mu̱heeleli̱ya wee, niikuwo abahe mu̱gi̱sa kubakoonela kwekuukamu bibhi byanu.”
Obu Peetelo na Yohaana baanabu̱ghi̱lagha bantu aba, bahongi̱, mukulu wa baasilikale abalindagha Numba ya Luhanga, na bamui mu Basadukaayo, baaki̱dhʼo.
Baasaaliluwa nanga bakwenda aba beegheesi̱yagha kandi baalangilila ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka okuli mu Yesu.
Du̱mbi̱ baakwata Peetelo na Yohaana. Bhaatu ngoku bwali ni bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, baabata mu nkomo, baalinda bwile kukiya.
Ti̱ bantu bakani̱ye abaaghu̱u̱ye ebi Peetelo na Yohaana bakwete ku̱bu̱gha baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu. Muhendo ghwa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja ghwaba haai basaasa nku̱mi̱ etaano.
Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, beebembeli̱, bengei̱, hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, baaba na Lukulato Lukulu mu Yelusaalemu.
Anansi, mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, Kayaafa, Yohaana, Alekijanda na bantu banji nganda sya Anansi oghu, boona bakaba bali mu Lukulato olu.
Niibuwo baaleeti̱yemu Peetelo na Yohaana, baabaami̱li̱li̱ya haagati yabo, baababu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mulema oghu mwamu̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu̱ti̱ya? Kandi ni ani̱ aabahaaye bu̱toki̱ obu?”
Peetelo aasuuye Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we beebembeli̱ na bengei̱,
mukaakuba ni̱mu̱tu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya obwalo haabwa kintu kisemeeye eki twakoleeye mulema oni, kandi nimubbala kumanya ngoku aaki̱li̱ye,

muleke nkighambile enu̱we na bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ boona. Musaasa oni aamiliiye hani endindi akiliiye kimui haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwa Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱. Mukamubamba haa musalaba aaku̱wa, bhaatu Luhanga aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la.
Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱mu̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo biti, niiye
“ ‘Ebaale eli bakweli̱ baabhengi̱ye,
niiliyo lyahaghi̱ki̱ye numba kusaali̱ya ghanji ghoona.’
Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kutujuna, nanga taaliyo li̱i̱na linji munsi yoona alyaheebeeu̱we bantu elikugubha kutujuna.”

Obu baamemba abaabaagha mu Lukulato olu baaboone ngoku Peetelo na Yohaana bakwete ku̱bu̱gha batoobahi̱ye, ti̱ baabona bali bantu baa bu̱li̱ kilo kandi batasomi̱ye, baasweka, baamanya ngoku basaasa aba baakalagha na Yesu.
Bhaatu haabwa kubona musaasa oghu baaki̱li̱i̱ye aamiliiye nabo, baasaaghuwa kubahakani̱ya.
Baamemba aba baatwesi̱ya Peetelo na Yohaana mu Lukulato olu, baahanuula bati,
“Basaasa aba tubakole ki? Nanga baakoli̱ye kyakuswekani̱ya, ti̱ bu̱li̱ muntu oghu ali mu Yelusaalemu akimani̱ye, kandi tatukugubha kuhakana tuti takyabaayʼo.
Bhaatu kutanga makulu ghʼeki baakoli̱ye eki kumalakaka mu bantu boona, oleke tubatangile kimui tuti batatodha kwegheesi̱ya muntu nʼomui mbabu̱ghʼo Yesu.”
Niibuwo baabilikiiye bakwenda aba Peetelo na Yohaana kutodha kutaahamu. Baabatangila kimui bati, “Mutatodha ku̱bu̱gha kedha kwegheesi̱ya kintu kyona ekikwetʼo Yesu.”
Bhaatu Peetelo na Yohaana baabakuukamu bati, “Naanu mu̱tu̱wemu, buuye ki̱hi̱ki̱ye etu̱we ku̱hu̱ti̱ya enu̱we mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Luhanga?
Tatukugubha kuleka ku̱bu̱gha ebi twaboone nʼebi twaghu̱u̱ye.”
Obu abaabaagha mu Lukulato baamali̱ye kuboobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, baabalekela haabwa kubuluwa ekyanguleka mbabafubila. Boobaha bantu boona abaasindagha Luhanga haabwa ekyabaayʼo,
nanga musaasa oghu kyakuswekani̱ya kya kukila eki kyabaayʼo, akaba asaaye haa myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa ya bukulu.
Makalekela bati Peetelo na Yohaana, baaghenda hambali baanakyabo bali, baabaghambila byona ebi bakulu baa bahongi̱ na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baabaghambiiye.
Obu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, baasabila hamui Luhanga bati, “Mukama Wamaani̱, oghu okahanga nsi nʼeghulu, nanja na ebilimu byona,
uwe oghu okabu̱gha nookoleesi̱ya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kukwama mu mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe, taata waatu Dhau̱dhi̱, ku̱bu̱gha ati,
“ ‘Haabwaki Banamahanga basaaliluuwe,
kandi bantu mbakuhanuulagha bitaakughasa?
Bakama baa munsi muni beeteekani̱i̱je,
na balemi̱ beekumaani̱i̱ye hamui
kuhakani̱ya Mukama
kandi kuhakani̱ya oghu aaseeseu̱wʼo magita wee.’
Majima kuwo, Helude, Ponti̱yo Pilaato, Banamahanga na Banai̱saaleeli̱, bakagumbaana mu kibugha kini kuhakani̱ya mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye Yesu, oghu waaseesi̱yʼo magita.
Baakola kyonini eki uwe mu magheji na bu̱toki̱ bwawe waasangu̱u̱we otu̱u̱yemu kubʼo.
Nahabweki Mukama, olole ngoku bakwete kutwobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya. Ohe etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe maani̱ ghaa kulangilila kighambo kyawe tutoobahi̱ye.
Wooleke bantu bu̱toki̱ bwawe, niikuwo tugubhe ku̱ki̱li̱ya balwaye kandi kukola byakuswekani̱ya haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwa mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye Yesu.”
Obu baamali̱ye kusaba, numba eghi baabaaghamu yaadhinga-dhinga. Boona baasula Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kandi beeyongela kulangilila kighambo kya Luhanga batoobahi̱ye.
Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba boona bakaba bali mu bumui, taaliyo nʼomui oghu aaghilagha ati bintu ebi ali nabiyo mbiye enkaha, bhaatu bu̱li̱ muntu aatambulanagha na muunakiye aka akali nako.
Bakwenda aba baahaagha buukai̱so bwamaani̱ bwa ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwa Mukama Yesu. Kandi Luhanga aabaghililagha ngughuma boona.
Nanga taaliyo nʼomui oghu aabuluwagha kantu koona. Abaabaagha na bibanja kedha manumba baabi̱ghu̱li̱yagha. Sente esyalu̱ghaghamu
basileetela bakwenda, basitambu̱li̱ya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyabo kusighikila mu byetaagho byabo.

Kyakulolelʼo, hakaba haliyo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja omui li̱i̱na liye Yojeefu̱. Akaba ali wʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, bamubyaliiye mu ehanga lya Ki̱pu̱lo, oghu bakwenda baali balu̱ki̱ye kibbaako Balanaba (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya “Oghu akwekambi̱i̱si̱yagha baanakiye”).
Aaghu̱li̱ya musili ghuwe, sente esyalu̱ghi̱yemu syona, aasileetela bakwenda kusitambu̱li̱ya abali na byetaagho.
Bhaatu akaba aliyo musaasa omui li̱i̱na liye Ananiya. Eye na mukali̱ wee Safi̱la baaghu̱li̱ya ghumui haa misili yabo.
Haanu̱ma yabo ku̱u̱ghu̱wana, aati̱ghali̱ya ki̱twi̱ke kya sente esyalu̱ghi̱yemu. Esyati̱ghaayʼo aasileetela bakwenda.
Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Ananiya, Si̱taani̱ aaku̱koleeseei̱ye kwebiikila ki̱twi̱ke kya sente esi waahi̱ye mu musili ghwawe kandi kudimaaga Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye nangaaki?

Obu waabaagha otakaghu̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye taghwabaagha ghwawe? Noobu wangu̱ghu̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye, sente tawangu̱si̱koleeseei̱ye ngoku obbali̱ye? Waatu̱u̱yemu kukola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kitiyo nangaaki? Tawadimaagi̱ye bantu, waadimaagi̱ye Luhanga.”
Ananiya akaba makaaghu̱wa ati bighambo ebi, eegenga aku̱u̱ye. Bamui mu batabhana baasa baaboha mu̱ku̱ ghuwe baaghu̱twesi̱ya, baaghujiika. Ti̱ abaaghu̱u̱ye boona boobahila kimui.
Haanu̱ma ya saaha ngʼesatu, mukali̱ wee aataaha mu numba eghi atamani̱ye ekyabaayʼo.
Peetelo aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ongambile, sini niisiyo sente syona esi uwe na bali̱i̱waawe mwatu̱ngi̱ye mu musili ghwanu mwaghu̱li̱i̱ye?” Aakuukamu ati, “Ee, niisiyo esi.”

Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Uwe na bali̱i̱waawe mwaghu̱wane kudimaaga Mwoyo wa Mukama nangaaki? Ooghu̱we! Abaku̱lu̱gha kujiika bali̱i̱waawe balimataaha, naawe baku̱ku̱twesi̱ya endindi kukujiika.”
